story:
Short Summary

Last year you helped us develop a low cost, battery powered air flow monitor called FilterWatch and that alone will save you money, big time! That's it in the overlay image above. That was only half the story. FilterWatch tells you WHEN it is time to change your home air filters based on low air flow (dirty filters). Now we want to change your filter for you.

Better yet, let your power company change your filter for you AND pay for the hardware. All you do is collect the benefits of cleaner air to breathe and lower energy bills!

What's The Story

During the development of FilterWatch, we approached many service providers with the idea of them giving FilterWatch to their customers at NO COST.

It seems counter to their business since they want to sell electricity but they offer rebates for all kinds of energy saving appliances and light bulbs.

Without going into a big story, it's all about meeting peak demand. It costs a lot of money in infrastructure to move electricity around based on demands in one area versus another. Energy efficiency helps keep infrastructure costs down.

Before service providers offer rebates on a product, they want some guarantee that the product will reduce the demand. A product being part of the Energy Star program provides some of those guarantees. There is no Energy Star category for thermostats, automatic blinds, smart monitors so it is up to the product manufacturer to convince the service providers that their product will save energy.

That was the brick wall that we ran into in one of our marketing plans but we know it's possible to get service providers on board. You just have to give them a little control.

The power companies would want to be able to cycle in new filters when the electricity grid demand is approaching critical levels. Even changing a filter that is 10% clogged will make a difference if you change enough of them.

Check out how this works with one energy service provider and the Nest Thermostat Controller...HERE. If the user signs up to allow the service provider to change the temperature of their home by a maximum of 3 degrees, they will give you a NEST for FREE. A $250 deal!

So that's the challenge we've been pondering for a few months. 

The Smart Air Filter Changer

So what would make our automatic filter changer smart?  FilterWatch of course.  

There are a whole lot of patents regarding automatic filter changers and they all have one thing in common, They change the filter based on TIME. Ours would change the filter base on reduction of air flow (how dirty it is). That's where our air flow monitor (FilterWatch) comes in.

Filterwatch provides the 'Smarts' and the connectivity to the Internet. It knows (learns) when the HVAC unit is running, how quickly it gets clogged, when to alarm (and when not to), and it has many other features.

Here is a list of specs we are considering for the filter changing unit , please feel free to comment.

  • Powered from a rechargeable battery (charged when there is air flow) allows for easy installation.
  • A minimum of 6 changes on a 30 inch filter.
  • Dual roller cartridges - full roll and take-up roller with pre-attached filter material.
  • Retrofit installation for existing homes
  • unload/load button to roll up last filter and tension first filter
  • Wireless communication to FilterWatch

What Will The Funds Be Used For?

While Mike and I do our own electronics and firmware, we don't have a lick of mechanical drawing ability between us. We do our research, we document the 'must haves' and the 'would like to haves', we make pencil drawings and we take pictures of similar ideas, then we give all that to a mechanical engineer.  Funds would be used in the following order:
  • Mechanical Design
  • First Machined Prototype
  • Mock up electronics

What Do You Get For Supporting Us?

Sure, it would be nice to raise enough funds to take our idea all the way to hardware and delivery to customers. But who are we kidding, that would require 10's of thousands of dollars. Just getting the filter manufacturers to support rolled filter material that meets our specification will  be a journey in itself. 

While supporting us won't get you a filter changer, we still have something very cool to offer and you. FilterWatch. It's an extremely smart air flow monitor that looks at the reduction in air flow to decide when it is time to change your filter.. 

Heck, if you are a golfer, fly model air planes, or just like to know the wind speed, it doubles as an anemometer up to about 20mph.

Find out more about FilterWatch HERE at PogTech.com
A quick note on the installation video. I have mounts already stuck to several vents in my house. That is done with special sticky tape that we provide. We really can't believe how easy this turned out and we are glad we went through 3-4 iterations of the design base design.

If you have already supported FilterWatch and want to continue to support our efforts, we also have a simple long sleeve T-Shirt with our company name and tagline. Check out other colors we are considering in the gallery.

That tagline says it all: "Persistence over Genius". We're not the smartest 2 guys in the world, but we will finish come hell or high water. When we ran out money, we didn't stick our tails between our legs and whine that we didn't have enough money. No, we ponied up and we are still moving forward. OK, we're late, we admit it, but its more than just 'finishing' we engineered more into the product for everyone's benefit.  Now, when you wear this shirt, you know what it stands for.

The Impact

The impact of cleaner air in your homes and energy efficiency are undeniable. Numerous studies show that clean air filters make the biggest impact on reducing allergens in your home AND reducing the energy consumption of your home. In the average home, the HVAC unit is responsible for 50% of the energy bill over the whole year! Studies show that most people change their filters way too late. 

Less air flow = longer run time = higher costs

But....

We are after something even bigger. Energy service providers rebate products that promote energy efficiency UNLESS they require human interaction...like changing the filter...like programming a thermostat. FilterWatch can alert you to a clogged filter all week, if you don't change the filter, it's not doing you any good! 

However, if your service provider has the ability to rotate your filter, that's a whole new ballgame. On periods of high demand, it costs you and the power companies a lot of money to generate enough electricity to meet the demand. If service providers had the ability to change enough of their customer filters, this demand could be greatly reduced.

So there you have it...the golden egg....no battery or filter changes for months, lower energy bills, cleaner air in your home, for FREE!

    Risks & Challenges of Getting Your Perk

    Most of the parts for the FilterWatch monitors we are offering are in stock because we ordered a minimum of 1000 qty on long lead items . The hardware is working great. Its all about the software at this point. We expect to be delivering units well before this crowd fund ends.

    Thanks For Making It This Far

    We admit it, we didn't spend a lot of time presenting our idea here on IndieGoGo because we have commitments to our initial backers. When you support PoG you are supporting a mission.  
    If a product saves energy but takes 3 years to recover your costs, is it worth it? You can pay $200 extra for a higher rated energy star product that saves you an extra $26 a year. Does that make sense? The power company will give you an extra $50 rebate, does that make any more sense? 
    How about giving FIlterWatch for FREE and trusting that the user will change their filters when the alarm goes off!  
    Can you even measure the value of 1 less asthma attack? Clean air filters are not the solution to all our problems but the return value you can get from maybe $150 worth of hardware for a fully automated system that keeps a clean filter in your home for extended periods of time seems like it is within reach. 
    We want to build common sense products that have a really short return on investment. Thanks for the support.

story:
About this action:

My name is Adriana, I've lived and worked in Nepal as a Spanish teacher in Vistare Foundation. It's been two years I left. Today, one of my best student, Smarika, wrote me a letter which left me breathless. Her mother is sick, from heart, she ask me desperately for help.

What she needs :

Smarika's mother, lives near Muktinath, a village nearly 4000 m altitude, within the Himalayas. Smarika was raise up in one special center to succeed on the studies, it is where I came to know her. Now she wrote me, after almost two years, asking me desperately for help. To send her mother to a hospital and cover the cost of an operation is a sum of money that she cannot cover. But together we can save the life of this woman. Here you have the first letter I received from Kathmandu. I want to thank you for your humble cooperation. € 2000 could save the life of a Nepali woman, and for so little, do much.


"Hello Adriana
Perdoname porque estoy escribiendo en ingles ....vale.
Que te piensas que alguien quiere cosa grande pero no es posible. 

When I joined Vistare Foundation, I had decided that I will change my life. I left my sick father, my mother and brother all in their situation so that I can lift my life and fulfill my dream.
So many things happened in my life. I never took it complication as Carlos Uncle is always there behind me. Because of him, I could do my father's operation. Nevertheless, he did everything from his side.
I am about to finish my bachelor... He wants me to complete masters. I told him that I wanted to go abroad for my studies.... fight for scholarship...... 
Time has put me other situation, this time my mother is really sick. She need to  operate as she has heart disease. Father is jobless now... I am knocking to each door wherever possible finding job for him.
I am sharing with you... don't take it other way. Because sharing with other is good way of getting rid of pain.... right
What do you think I should do?
 Smarika"
story_txt:
About this action: My name is Adriana, I've lived and worked in Nepal as a Spanish teacher in Vistare Foundation. It's been two years I left. Today, one of my best student, Smarika, wrote me a letter which left me breathless. Her mother is sick, from heart, she ask me desperately for help.   What she needs : 
Smarika's mother, lives near
Muktinath, a village nearly 4000 m altitude, within the Himalayas. Smarika was
raise up in one special center to succeed on the studies, it is where I came to
know her. Now she wrote me, after almost two years, asking me desperately for
help. To send her mother to a hospital and cover the cost of an operation is a
sum of money that she cannot cover. But together we can save the life of
this woman. Here you have the first letter I received from Kathmandu. I want to thank you for
your humble cooperation. € 2000 could save the life of a Nepali woman, and for
so little, do much.



"Hello Adriana

Perdoname porque estoy escribiendo en ingles ....vale.
Que te piensas que alguien quiere cosa grande pero no es posible. 

When I joined Vistare Foundation, I had decided that I will change my life. I left my sick father, my mother and brother all in their situation so that I can lift my life and fulfill my dream.


So many things happened in my life. I never took it complication as Carlos Uncle is always there behind me. Because of him, I could do my father's operation. Nevertheless, he did everything from his side.I am about to finish my bachelor... He wants me to complete masters. I told him that I wanted to go abroad for my studies.... fight for scholarship...... Time has put me other situation, this time my mother is really sick. She need to  operate as she has heart disease. Father is jobless now... I am knocking to each door wherever possible finding job for him.I am sharing with you... don't take it other way. Because sharing with other is good way of getting rid of pain.... rightWhat do you think I should do?
 Smarika"

story:
*** PLEASE CLICK ON THE 'GALLERY' TAB TO VIEW IMAGES JUST UPLOADED. THIS SHOWS THE ROOT OF WHY THIS CAMPAIGN IS SO NECESSARY ***

If we cannot reach out to our community and friends, then, well, what's the point?  The money required to pay for Medical Bills, Gas Money for Doctor visits miles away, Prescriptions for his Heart Medications & He is also a Diabetic since the age of 9, and any type of psychological-factored assessment is herein a part. (Not to mention the bills that just keep on coming, right now as I type this. Dont you wish you could just PAUSE it for a while??) ... it just keps adding up. He has certainly accepted the assistaces offered to him by our County and City, -but- they can only do so much here in Ohio, unfortunately. -- He has been so emotional through all of this and he worries MORE about OTHERS through this instead of himself! Such an INSPIRING individual. SO, Now it's my turn to step up and do EVERYTHING in my power to help him with his situation. I have made a somewhat small "Goal" as this is my first time doing this, but it said divide how much we need by 100 and set the goal. So, then, it's 3,000 on here if I do that ... so, thirty thousand? Yes! I know! It IS that bad, guys. He needs ANY help we can all give him, and it is absolutely IMPARATIVE, especially after receiving the first of his bills. It is MUCH more than we had anticipated. EIGHTY-SIX-THOUSAND. Please show him your support and donate whatever you can. Also, you can simply Spread The Word and spread the Love by using the LINK directly under his photo above to post and SHARE to Facebook, or any other social media. The more people that see this, the more chances he has of reaching his goals. So much Love and appreciation! I will be posting videos as soon as possible so that we can show you guys his progress and to talk about just how IMPORTANT and NECESSARY this Campaign is. Thank You to anyone who contributes & Spreads the Word and Spreads the Love. Thank You for your time! God Bless You! 

                                                 xoxo --  David and Justin

"The Best way to REALLY, truly predict the future? CREATE IT. --Stand up for what you believe in and who you Love. The rest will fall into place, but only if you let it.  -Me, 2013 

 

Why Fund Me?

I am seeking funding for and to help David & his recovery/aftermath of surgery. Funds contributed will go directly toward Medical Bill Payments, Prescriptions, gas to get to and from Doctor visits, household Bills, and so much more. I am dedicated to this man and will do whatever it takes to make sure he is healthy and doesn't have to stress too much about how he is going to transition back into life after such an unimaginable surgery and situation.

Is this really necessary?

Absolutely! David is an amazing man, and many many people and co-workers can attest to that fact. He deserves to be able to be well and GET well so he can return to work and have a seamless transition into the world after this medical crisis. Please lend us your hand in saving this man the trouble and hardship of wondering what the heck to do.

Can You Contact us?

Yes! Feel free to correspond with me as we go through this recovery process and healing journey. We are BOTH on Facebook and I will be posting videos to my YouTube once I figure out how to do it! David will not only be trying to rest and recover physically, but he has all of this time to just sit and think about how serious all of this is and how lucky he is to be alive. It's making him crazy and he is so emotional. I Love him so much!

facebook.com/justin.phoenix

facebook.com/SnackPikl

Youtube name is- juriki27

 

                               GOD BLESS!

story:
The Video

Sorry the video is in Italian! Here are translations of the text:

Arbias' operation went well, his pain diminishes more every day.
Gent's situation does not improve. They may try a bone marrow test.
Finally Darinda was discharged. She only needs to return to the hospital for a check up.
Michael is taking a short break from his treatment. The doctors say it's too early to make predictions.
Rodas' histological exam had a negative result. He will go home next week.
"We give sick children the opportunity to just be children."

Katie's Birthday/Holiday Fundraiser

Hi everyone! During my semester abroad, I volunteered at Associazione KIM Onlus, an organization that provides a home and medical treatment for sick children from all over the world. I loved working with the children at KIM and seeing the amazing work the volunteers do, so I was really upset when I heard that the government of Lazio is drastically reducing their funding. This is a HUGE problem, since a lot of money is needed for expensive medications, surgeries, etc. Please make a contribution to ensure that KIM won't have to turn away children who are suffering from treatable illnesses!

What They Need

Associazione KIM will use the funds we provide for a number of services the children and their families need. This may include plane tickets to bring the children to Rome, food and cleaning supplies for the Casa di KIM where they live, payments for surgeries and medication to treat them, and much more.

The Impact

Associazione KIM has changed the lives of children from all over the world. It is truly amazing to spend time with the kids and see how happy they are at KIM. The association has saved the lives of over a hundred children and has kept them healthier and happier than was possible in their home countries. We can't let the financial troubles of the Italian government stop their amazing and successful work!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that's absolutely fine! It is equally important to spread the word and share this with as many people as you can! I would really appreciate it if you could all pass this on to a few friends or family members and encourage them to donate. I want Associazione KIM and all the kids to know that their friends in the United States care about them, so please spread the word!

story:
Short Summary

Quebec Premier Pauline Marois government introduced a  legislation to establish a "Charter of Quebec Values"  where the citizens will be banned wearing religious clothing, from Sikh turbans, Jewish  kippas, to Muslim hijab veils because is more expedient and more popular to scapegoat this groups than doing what it would take to actually tackle Quebec's many (self-imposed) problems.


Religious freedom is a right guaranteed by the Quebec and Canadian charters of rights, and If we want to preach secularism, it should be all or nothing because on one hand one can hardly demand that visible symbols of one's faith are limited and/or removed from public places and on the other hand crosses hang on the walls of many institutions like the National Assembly because they are regarded as cultural, not religious. Don't just purge some religious symbols, while protecting others. That's not secularism; that's discrimination.

If we divide people into "us" and "them" is only geared to appeal to and appease intolerant hardliners who are under the misguided impression that their way of life is under attack. It's not. No one immigrates to another country to impose "their" way of life. A confident society allows people to be who they are, as long as they respect the law of the land. Choosing to tolerate and accept another's religion.

Read more here


What We Need 

To Take Out Full Page AD on NY Times to denounce this legislation because we believe Premier Pauline Marois policies  could be described as xenophobic and racist, and everyone has the right to be respected for their beliefs, and if this bill is passed we're calling a cultural & economic boycott of Quebec, because this Law is wrong, illegal and a disgrace to humankind. and no one want's to  be in a place where someone feels that their values can only flourish if those of their neighbors are suppressed.

The Impact

With your help, and only with your help, we can say to Quebec “back off”.  The idea of banning someone from being in a position of authority, like a teacher or a doctor, because they wear a kippah or a turban, is unconscionable. 

Ways You Can Help

Please Donate what you can, no matter how small but don't stop there!

Share our IndieGoGo fundraising link with your social network/friends and encourage them to do the same.

Send our project to any and everyone you think might be interested.

Don't stand by quietly  It's easy to sit on the sidelines. But this is not somebody else's problem. This is OUR problem. This campaign was started and built up by ordinary people, and we're going to win because people like you are not just watching but acting.

Conclusion

Pastor Martin Niemöller’s famous poem about the rise of the Nazis illustrates when a government attacks the rights of minorities and the majority is silent

 

“First they came for the communists, and I did not speak out—

because I was not a communist;

Then they came for the socialists, and I did not speak out—

because I was not a socialist;

Then they came for the trade unionists, and I did not speak out—

because I was not a trade unionist;

Then they came for the Jews, and I did not speak out—

because I was not a Jew;

Then they came for me—

and there was no one left to speak out for me.” 



Your contribution is a blessing and we can't thank you enough for your support

story:
Sanitation Creations presents the Dungaroo

We want to talk to you about going to the bathroom. 

To quote a famous children’s book, “Everybody poops!”- But sometimes we have to hold it because our only options are pretty gross. 

We’ve created the Dungaroo to make your portable toilet experience enjoyable, and to ultimately help bring toilet options to the 2.5 billion people around the world who lack access to adequate sanitation. The Dungaroo is a waterless, odorless toilet made of mostly plastic materials that uses specially lined bags to treat and store the waste.

Mission

Our mission is to offer environmentally-friendly, hygienic sanitation solutions that are odorless, waterless, and economical. We’re working to provide a healthful, clean, and enjoyable bathroom experience.

Call us idealists, but we want our customers to love going to the bathroom! 

While people in the United States have been stuck with sub-par portable toilets, the developing world lacks even that. Along with clearing the air in domestic bathrooms, we’ll also provide our users with clear consciences as we work to ensure that hygienic sanitation is available worldwide. 

How We Got started

I (Liz Morris) am the founder and CEO of Sanitation Creations.  Four years ago, I was starting grad school at the University of North Carolina in Chapel Hill.  I wanted to attend a one-year masters program in a big city with no required research.  Somehow I ended up in a two-year masters program in a college town with required research.  I was a bit of an oddball in the Environmental Sciences and Engineering department because my background is in Packaging Science and their research specialties are water and air. Luckily, my advisor was just transferring from the World Health Organization's Water and Sanitation Sector.  In our first conversation, he asked how I felt about packaging poop for my research.  I knew I had found the perfect project!  

                      

Hanging out with the kids in Ciudad de Dios, Peru

I spent time in Peru asking people about their toilet situations, cultural preferences, concerns, and wants in a toilet. One woman told us that she hated going at night because she was worried about snakes in her latrine.  (Ack!)  As I sat down to write my thesis, I realized that I spent more time doodling toilets on my thesis than actually writing it. 

When I graduated, it was plain to everyone around me that I loved packaging poop and that I had found my passion.  My cousin (a lawyer) gave me one of the best graduation presents a budding entrepreneur could receive, my incorporation papers. And so in May of 2011, Sanitation Creations was born.  

This is me (Liz) sitting on our second prototype of the Dungaroo.  

I immediately went to Dan Green, my best friend of 25 years (we met in pre-school in Fort Lauderdale, Florida) and asked if he would join me on my "shitty" toilet campaign.  I knew I would I need a accountant, budget man, realist, and friend to keep me and Sanitation Creations grounded.  Luckily, he agreed. 

Halloween in pre-school with 2 more of our best friends (that we are still friends with today!).  Dan is the ninja turtle.  I am the devil.  I am still causing trouble and he is still saving the day.

Dan and I at Machu Picchu in 2010

Since 2011, Sanitation Creations has made immense progress. We’ve sponsored research at NC State University in Raleigh to help with development of the Dungaroo and the bag cartridge, we have created and tested two fully functioning prototypes, and have made connections with the appropriate manufactures to help us get the Dungaroo on the market - All we need now is your help!

The Team

Aside from me, our team also includes Dan Green, our CFO with a background in accounting and finance, Sarah Nilson from NC State who does our PR and marketing, and David Walker, our waste to energy engineer.

The Sanitation Creations (minus David)

What is the Dungaroo?

The patent-pending Dungaroo is a waterless, odorless toilet that uses specially-lined plastic bags to hold the waste. When the Dungaroo is mechanically flushed using its foot pedal, it drops in an anti-microbial that treats the waste, drops it into the storage bin out of view, and pulls the next bag into place. The Dungaroo is easy to empty and turns what would be bio-hazardous waste into regular trash!

*This is the prototype of the Dungaroo.  The actual Dungaroo will be white plastic.  

The Dungaroo is the only toilet of its kind that seals, treats and stores the waste.

The Dungaroo works in 3 easy steps.  

  1. When flushed the Dungaroos' gears seal the bag, drop it into a containment bag and pull a new bag into place.  
  2. Anti-microbial agents in the bags treat the waste. 
  3. No special equipment needed-just toss the used bags into the trash.  


The Dungaroo is great for anywhere that water is just not an option. Our initial market is to get the Dungaroo into boats and RVs, but other uses include vacation homes, buildings without septic tanks, farms, places where installing a septic tank is expensive, camping, etc.  

One day, we hope to get the Dungaroo fitted in planes, trains, cruise ships, porta-potties, and of course, developing countries.

Our research shows that boat and RV users want a toilet that has environmental benefits and reduces the amount of water held onboard the boat or RV. The emptying process for boat and RV owners is difficult and odorous. The current process involves pumping out the waste using a hose to connect to a septic tank and taking the waste to water treatment site. Then, the waste ultimately ends up in sludge treatment or dumped into a landfill. With the Dungaroo, boat and RV owners no longer need a black water tank and gain additional storage on board.

The Dungaroo can be retrofitted into most boats or RV’s. 
Dimensions are 18” x 18” x 18”.

And again, the used bags can go right into the trash - we’ve made sure the bags meet all regulations to allow you to do this!  Our system not only treats the waste and kills all bacteria; it also eliminates the odor, while preventing harmful methane gas from getting out into the atmosphere.

About Replacement Cartridges

Additional replacement cartridges will be available for order on our website starting in early 2014.  We are also working with national distributors to get them into a store near you.  So when you are out exploring, and realize that you used your last cartridge, you will be able to get them.  We do suggest that you keep a few extra cartridges on hand though when traveling. No worries about storage, because you will no longer need that blackwater tank.  We are ensuring that the bags will always be available to our Dungaroo users. The Replacement Cartridges go right underneath the seat and drop right in similar to the Diaper Genie.  

Why Boats and RVs first?

Studies have shown that toilets are more likely to be accepted and used in developing countries if they are accepted first in developed countries.  It raises the Dungaroo to gold standard toilet status.  It makes it more in line with the porcelain throne that we get use to at home now.  We want the Dungaroo to be the plastic throne.  It also allows us to scale our production in the United States, which brings down our manufacturing cost.  This will allow us to provide the Dungaroo to those people that need it most at an affordable cost and it helps that profits from the Dungaroo will go towards further subsidizing it.  We are using the resources, partners, reputation that we are building in the United States to ensure successful uptake in developing countries.  As we all know, new technologies can be scary, especially ones like a toilet.  Boats, RVs, and the other markets we will eventually be entering remove that scariness.    

Why are we on Indiegogo?

We need your help to mass-produce the Dungaroo for all people who are suffering with current portable toilet options. While we currently have a working prototype, our $50,000 Indiegogo goal will get us through the final stage of design and will help us start tooling and manufacturing set up. We will be unlocking special offers for anyone who has already supported us when we reach new levels of support!

Stretch Goal = $100,000

Our Stretch goal of $100,000 will allow us to finish tooling and begin production! If we reach our stretch goal of $100,000 then everyone who pledged at the $400 level or higher will receive an extra bag cartridge for your Dungaroo! 

We don't think this will happen but if we do not reach our goals, we will still be going into production.  You will definitely be getting a Dungaroo and our other rewards.  It just means that they might be slightly delayed.  Flexible funding on Indiegogo requires that we are still responsible to send out our rewards.  

Reward Breakdown Summary

As they say, a picture is worth a thousand words! 

If we reach our goal, all backers will be given recognition on our website.

Free Shipping in the USA.  

For International Shipping, please email us (info@sanitationcreations.com) for rates.

How We Got started
I (Liz Morris) am the founder and CEO of Sanitation Creations.  Four years ago, I was starting grad school at the University of North Carolina in Chapel Hill.  I wanted to attend a one-year masters program in a big city with no required research.  Somehow I ended up in a two-year masters program in a college town with required research.  I was a bit of an oddball in the Environmental Sciences and Engineering department because my background is in Packaging Science and their research specialties are water and air. Luckily, my advisor was just transferring from the World Health Organization's Water and Sanitation Sector.  In our first conversation, he asked how I felt about packaging poop for my research.  I knew I had found the perfect project!  

                      
Hanging out with the kids in Ciudad de Dios, Peru

I spent time in Peru asking people about their toilet situations, cultural preferences, concerns, and wants in a toilet. One woman told us that she hated going at night because she was worried about snakes in her latrine.  (Ack!)  As I sat down to write my thesis, I realized that I spent more time doodling toilets on my thesis than actually writing it. 
When I graduated, it was plain to everyone around me that I loved packaging poop and that I had found my passion.  My cousin (a lawyer) gave me one of the best graduation presents a budding entrepreneur could receive, my incorporation papers. And so in May of 2011, Sanitation Creations was born.  


This is me (Liz) sitting on our second prototype of the Dungaroo.  

I immediately went to Dan Green, my best friend of 25 years (we met in pre-school in Fort Lauderdale, Florida) and asked if he would join me on my "shitty" toilet campaign.  I knew I would I need a accountant, budget man, realist, and friend to keep me and Sanitation Creations grounded.  Luckily, he agreed. 





Halloween in pre-school with 2 more of our best friends (that we are still friends with today!).  Dan is the ninja turtle.  I am the devil.  I am still causing trouble and he is still saving the day.



Dan and I at Machu Picchu in 2010

Since 2011, Sanitation Creations has made immense progress. We’ve sponsored research at NC State University in Raleigh to help with development of the Dungaroo and the bag cartridge, we have created and tested two fully functioning prototypes, and have made connections with the appropriate manufactures to help us get the Dungaroo on the market - All we need now is your help!
The Team
Aside from me, our team also includes Dan Green, our CFO with a background in accounting and finance, Sarah Nilson from NC State who does our PR and marketing, and David Walker, our waste to energy engineer.


The Sanitation Creations (minus David)
What is the Dungaroo?
The patent-pending Dungaroo is a waterless, odorless toilet that uses specially-lined plastic bags to hold the waste. When the Dungaroo is mechanically flushed using its foot pedal, it drops in an anti-microbial that treats the waste, drops it into the storage bin out of view, and pulls the next bag into place. The Dungaroo is easy to empty and turns what would be bio-hazardous waste into regular trash!





*This is the prototype of the Dungaroo.  The actual Dungaroo will be white plastic.  
The Dungaroo is the only toilet of its kind that seals, treats and stores the waste.


The Dungaroo works in 3 easy steps.  


When flushed the Dungaroos' gears seal the bag, drop it into a containment bag and pull a new bag into place.  
Anti-microbial agents in the bags treat the waste. 
No special equipment needed-just toss the used bags into the trash.  





The Dungaroo is great for anywhere that water is just not an option. Our initial market is to get the Dungaroo into boats and RVs, but other uses include vacation homes, buildings without septic tanks, farms, places where installing a septic tank is expensive, camping, etc.  
One day, we hope to get the Dungaroo fitted in planes, trains, cruise ships, porta-potties, and of course, developing countries.
Our research shows that boat and RV users want a toilet that has environmental benefits and reduces the amount of water held onboard the boat or RV. The emptying process for boat and RV owners is difficult and odorous. The current process involves pumping out the waste using a hose to connect to a septic tank and taking the waste to water treatment site. Then, the waste ultimately ends up in sludge treatment or dumped into a landfill. With the Dungaroo, boat and RV owners no longer need a black water tank and gain additional storage on board.
The Dungaroo can be retrofitted into most boats or RV’s. Dimensions are 18” x 18” x 18”.
And again, the used bags can go right into the trash - we’ve made sure the bags meet all regulations to allow you to do this!  Our system not only treats the waste and kills all bacteria; it also eliminates the odor, while preventing harmful methane gas from getting out into the atmosphere.
About Replacement Cartridges
Additional replacement cartridges will be available for order on our website starting in early 2014.  We are also working with national distributors to get them into a store near you.  So when you are out exploring, and realize that you used your last cartridge, you will be able to get them.  We do suggest that you keep a few extra cartridges on hand though when traveling. No worries about storage, because you will no longer need that blackwater tank.  We are ensuring that the bags will always be available to our Dungaroo users. The Replacement Cartridges go right underneath the seat and drop right in similar to the Diaper Genie.  

Why Boats and RVs first?
Studies have shown that toilets are more likely to be accepted and used in developing countries if they are accepted first in developed countries.  It raises the Dungaroo to gold standard toilet status.  It makes it more in line with the porcelain throne that we get use to at home now.  We want the Dungaroo to be the plastic throne.  It also allows us to scale our production in the United States, which brings down our manufacturing cost.  This will allow us to provide the Dungaroo to those people that need it most at an affordable cost and it helps that profits from the Dungaroo will go towards further subsidizing it.  We are using the resources, partners, reputation that we are building in the United States to ensure successful uptake in developing countries.  As we all know, new technologies can be scary, especially ones like a toilet.  Boats, RVs, and the other markets we will eventually be entering remove that scariness.    

Why are we on Indiegogo?
We need your help to mass-produce the Dungaroo for all people who are suffering with current portable toilet options. While we currently have a working prototype, our $50,000 Indiegogo goal will get us through the final stage of design and will help us start tooling and manufacturing set up. We will be unlocking special offers for anyone who has already supported us when we reach new levels of support!
Stretch Goal = $100,000
Our Stretch goal of $100,000 will allow us to finish tooling and begin production! If we reach our stretch goal of $100,000 then everyone who pledged at the $400 level or higher will receive an extra bag cartridge for your Dungaroo! 
We don't think this will happen but if we do not reach our goals, we will still be going into production.  You will definitely be getting a Dungaroo and our other rewards.  It just means that they might be slightly delayed.  Flexible funding on Indiegogo requires that we are still responsible to send out our rewards.  
Reward Breakdown Summary
As they say, a picture is worth a thousand words! 
If we reach our goal, all backers will be given recognition on our website.
Free Shipping in the USA.  
For International Shipping, please email us (info@sanitationcreations.com) for rates.

story:
Hello! Speaking on behalf of participants of the BAM (Becoming A Man) Sports Program, we would like to introduce ourselves. We are Malik, Dontonio, Demarcus, and Marcus and we are all sophomore students at William R. Harper High School, located in the West Englewood area of Chicago. I, Malik, would like to own a business that helps poor people out. I, Marcus, would like to become a chef and own my own restaurant. I, Dontonio, would like to either go to college or the military after high school. I, Demarcus, would like to become a comedian or a game show host.

As participants of the the BAM Sports Program, which have helped develop more positive entities within our character, we would like to start our own campaign to fund our after school boxing team, which is managed by great men who work for BAM. The campaign's objective is to raise money to purchase more boxing equipment for BAM's boxing program. We feel if we have more equipment, we can become better boxers.

We are from a community that's impoverished and filled with gun violence. Over the last two years, 30+ students were wounded by gun violence at our school and some did not make it including the girl's star basketball player. Fatal shootings occur in our neighborhoods every other day almost and we want to invest more in something positive like the BAM sports mentoring program. It would be an honor for our contributors to help us fund something that help save lives like it did ours.

As we mentioned to Slava, we need $800 for new equipment for the boxing program. If we receive the funding, the money will go to the BAM Counselor, Mr. Tim Jackson, and he will pass it along to World Sport Chicago's Program Manager Amy Kaufholz, who will make sure the funds will be used for its proper use. As for Perks, we will give a thank you cards, invitations to a BAM Boxing practice, tournaments, and any special events. We will also give special promotional opportunities for corporations. If we don't reach our entire funding goal, whatever money is raised will still be used for boxing equipment and a celebration to honor our efforts and Mr. Jackson for at least trying to accomplish this goal.

"Harper Boxing for BAM" is a funding project that's giving back to the BAM program. Mr. Jackson, the BAM Counselor here at Harper, has given us his all everyday he's here. He found unique and positive alternatives for us when other staff in the school shunned us away. Mr. Jackson is always consistent and that's what mattered most, so we decided to hopefully give back to the BAM program by raising money to buy extra boxing equipment so the BAM program won't have to spend more money from their budget and they can use that money later for something beneficial. Our project would be valuable to the contributor(s) because they would be helping us achieve a dream. Helping someone achieve a dream is highly comparable to a "Good Samaritan Act" and we would perpetually be thankful. Mr. Jackson helps us get closer to achieving our dream step-by-step and we would like to give back to him. One day WE WILL help someone else achieve their dreams.

We are going to ask school administration to help support our cause and our BAM staff is heavily involved for the push of our campaign. Indiegogo is the place to go and you will always remember Malik, Dontonio, Marcus, and Demarcus.


THANK YOU VERY MUCH!

story:
Cualli Tonalli – No toca Cheli

This means:'Good, beautiful day, my name is Cheli' in Nahuatl - the Aztec language.

I am currently studying the little known, ancient Mexican Aztec healing philosophy called Mexihka Pactli. As one of only a very small number of practitioners in the UK and Austria, I have a final course in Mexico I must undertake in order to be fully qualified.

The course starts on 20th October (2014), which is why I have set up this crowd funding campaign, in the hope I can achieve enough funds to pay for my trip and bring this amazing healing technique back for people in Europe to experience and enjoy.

Mexihka Pactli is a creative and uniquely traditional healing medicine. It's based on a philosophy which helps us live healthily by recovering balance in life, and achieving harmony with everything around us.

My studies have been with one of the leading pioneers for Mexihka Pactli, Eloxochitl Ivonne Margot Buendia Sanchez, who is based in Mexico and with Xalli responsible for introducing it to Europe. Eloxochitl is the founder of Calpulli Cencalli, an organisation which investigates the ancient philosophy and ensures the learnings continue to be shared and passed on to future generations. 

To cover the costs for the trip and the course, it will require me to raise £2,500. If you would like to make a donation to support me on my journey, I would appreciate it from the bottom of my heart. All supporters will be honoured with a gift from Mexico, and I will happily provide a free Mexihka Pactli treatment in either London or Hamburg for those who pledge £50 or more, meaning donators will be able to experience this wonderful healing form first hand.

Mexihka Pactli - this is a message, this is a treatment, this is an art piece, and this is a way to make things happen. 

Thank you so much and please contact me if you would like to find out more -chelimula@hotmail.com

and many thanks aswell for support and realisation of the project

camera - diego, part and parcel films

edit - fred, arch pictures

set angel - angeles

text and more  - ellie, sophie, vivian

and for mexihka wisdom eloxochitl

story:
We surpassed our fundraising goal!

Please order Before Elixir at our website!

You save money. We pay less fees!



This is Before Elixir.



A natural tonic that prevents redness caused by drinking.


Hi, I'm Jen, the creator of Before Elixir. I've never been able to enjoy a single alcoholic beverage without turning red or feeling sick my entire life. I knew many people shared this problem so I wanted to solve it. Badabing! Before Elixir was born.

Before Elixir is a drink that stops flushing, headaches, and nausea caused by problem called Alcohol Flush Reaction, also known as Asian Glow. This problem affects 15% of all people but particularly people of Asian descent of which 70% are affected. Before Elixir works by slowing down the metabolism of alcohol and the production of a toxin in your liver that is responsible for the flushing and ill feelings people who have this problem experience.


Decreases the production of toxins in your liver which cause redness.



Alcohol Flush 101


Before Elixir works on 90% of people and reduces flushing by over 60%.


FYI - These images aren't photoshopped. You can even ask Ellis our model! We tested dozens of people and the results were undeniable. But don't take our word for it, check out our testimonial video. The people in this video are strangers, not friends, who tired Before Elixir in LA and San Francisco and loved how it worked.

Made with natural ingredients. Good for you and your liver.


You know what's great about Before Elixir? (besides everything) It was made by a health nut. I don't believe in artificial ingredients or additives. I'm one of those people that juices and makes fruit smoothies everyday. Before Elixir is packed with ingredients that not only prevent flushing but make it healthier for you to drink overall. Learn all about what's inside.

B-Vitamins & Amino Acids: restore nutrients drinking takes away
Mangosteen & Lipoic Acid: antioxidants that naturally detoxify
Milk Thistle: supports healthy liver function, anti-hangover benefits!



Who's Talking About Us:


"This stuff works....my normal headache and increased heart rate  were
no where to be found."  Spoon University

 "Sipping this will save you from getting flushed while drinking."  Brit + Co

"...A natural, safe alternative." Food & Wine

"Put that Pepcid back in your pocket." Foodbeast 

"For those of you who suffer from Asian glow, you can start blasting 'Drunk In Love' ...thanks to Before Elixir." Audrey Magazine

"Do you turn red when you drink? There's a tonic for that." AngryAsianMan


Easy to take with you everywhere, so you can enjoy with friends anywhere.


Help Before Elixir get into bars, stores, and hands near you!


With the existing funds I had prior to Indiegogo, I researched, developed, and formulated Before Elixir into a drink that works and tastes pretty good too. I was also able to produce a limited run to sell on Before Elixir's website and to let customers try at tasting parties in Austin, LA, and San Francisco. During the first month Before Elixir was available online, we received over 30 orders! That's a lot for a new drink. However, producing a drink in small quantities is expensive per bottle and not cost effective. So I'd like to make a larger run and am now raising money to cover those costs.

In the beverage industry you have to choose between producing a small amount which is expensive per bottle, or making at least 50,000 bottles which is cheaper per bottle.  But I found a copacker (the people who bottle drinks) that could produce smaller runs economically and grow with us.

I want to get Before Elixir into bars and stores near you. That means producing enough volume, hiring distributors, shipping to various parts of the country, and building a team to help me execute so I don't have to do it alone. Your contributions will make all of this a reality. You will help Before Elixir get to the people who need it and enable me to run a more efficient business. 4 heads are better than 1 right? Well, maybe not on the same person....that's just weird.


Meet Jen, founder of Before Elixir.


Hi, I'm Jen. I created Before Elixir to solve a personal problem. When I drank alcohol, I not only flushed red, I also felt sick for hours. I knew that many people around the world had this problem too and I wanted to help. That's how Before Elixir was born!

I'm not a scientist or a chemist. I'm a determined problem solver and Before Elixir is my solution. I enlisted the help of scientific and beverage industry experts to help me create a drink that works. David Sprague, my angel investor and advisor, holds a Ph.D. in Medical Sciences and has an extensive research background in biochemistry. Aimy Steadman, my close friend and colleague is the founder of successful beverage startup and is teaching me the beverage industry ropes. Beung Kwon my Events Coordinator has a decade of experience organizing and promoting events for big brands in the beverage and clothing industries. 

With their help and your contribution, we can do this! Thank you for supporting my vision. High five or hugs... I enjoy hugs too.


FAQ: ask me anything!

How much do I have to drink for it to work?
We recommend you drink an entire 8 oz. bottle of Before Elixir 30 min before consuming alcohol and mix it with every 3rd drink if you're having a longer night out. However, everyone is different. Some have found good results with only half a bottle. You might find that you need one every 5 drinks or every 2. It's up to you!

Can it be used as a mixer?
MOST DEFINITELY! Before Elixir pairs excellently with rum, vodka, and gin. But don't be afraid to try your own concoctions and let us know what you like!

Does Before Elixir work with wine?
Wine contains many sulfates and allergens that cause people to turn red for reasons unrelated to Alcohol Flush, so Before Elixir may not work with wine but it really depends on the individual.

What does it taste like?
Slightly sweet vitamins with a bit of a kick at the end. The current sugar content is 15 grams for an 8 oz. serving. I'm working on reducing that in the next formulation. but all those vitamins and amino acids have a strong flavor and we want Before Elixir to be palatable.

Is it vegan, gluten, and dairy-free?
YES! ...How cool is that?

Why is international shipping so expensive?
We are working on getting an international distribution but for now we have to rely on USPS and these are the cheapest rates we can currently provide. If we are able to reduce the cost we'll pass on the savings to all our international customers.

Aimy Steadman, my close friend and colleague is the founder of   successful beverage startup and is teaching me the beverage industry ropes. story:
My name is Rasheed and I am a proud product of the historic Hamilton Park community. As the first African-American suburb in the state of Texas, Hamilton Park has a rich history and LEGACY of providing social programs and extracurricular activities to our youth. In recent years funding for these programs has all but diminished leaving our youth drastically under-served. For example, the local recreation center was closed for 9 months last year. The lack of resources and positive programming has produced an environment where youth have resorted to petty crimes, disrespect and a generational disconnect has become the norm. The Legacy Youth Sports and Mentoring program was created to fill this void and address the needs of the youth in our community. Our primary goal is to support the creation of a caring community structure that promotes positive youth development through education and mentoring. Mother Teresa said, “I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the waters to create many ripples.” We need your support to reach our goals and make a life long impression on the lives of our children. For the record.... I love HAMILTON PARK!!!!
 
Your generous contributions will be used to:
  • Provide scholarships for registration and uniforms
  • Purchase equipment and supplies
  • Rent training facilities and fields

As a small token of apperciation for every donation of $50.00 or more you will receive a Youth Legacy Sports T-shirt. 

 The Impact

The Youth Legacy Sports motto is "Our legacy is bigger than sports." We want to drive positive change in the historic Hamilton Park community and unleash the potential of youth through sports. Our approach is based on positive coaching, good sportsmanship, and leadership development through mentoring.We know that the physical, emotional and social benefits to an active lifestyle are a vital component to fostering healthy development in youth. We believe that anything is possible through commitment, passion and effort, and this is the legacy we strive to pass on. 

This year we have conducted three sucessful free football fundemental training camps under the direction of NFL Legend Everson Walls. Youth ages 5-15 showcased their talents and improved their skills through a variety of agility and position specific drills. An article about Youth Legacy Sports was featured in Lake Highlands Today (http://www.lakehighlandstoday.com/index.php/sports/article/legacy_youth_is_bigger_than_sports/) ,

 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are various ways to support the Youth Legacy Sports team. You can: 

  • Volunteer
  • Provide snacks and drinks 
  • Donate equipment 
  • Send us prays
  • Come out and support our events
story_txt:
My name is Rasheed and I am a proud product of the historic Hamilton Park community. As the first African-American suburb in the state of Texas, Hamilton Park has a rich history and LEGACY of providing social programs and extracurricular activities to our youth. In recent years funding for these programs has all but diminished leaving our youth drastically under-served. For example, the local recreation center was closed for 9 months last year. The lack of resources and positive programming has produced an environment where youth have resorted to petty crimes, disrespect and a generational disconnect has become the norm. The Legacy Youth Sports and Mentoring program was created to fill this void and address the needs of the youth in our community. Our primary goal is to support the creation of a caring community structure that promotes positive youth development through education and mentoring. Mother Teresa said, “I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the waters to create many ripples.” We need your support to reach our goals and make a life long impression on the lives of our children. For the record.... I love HAMILTON PARK!!!!
 
Your generous contributions will be used to:

Provide scholarships for registration and uniforms
Purchase equipment and supplies
Rent training facilities and fields

As a small token of apperciation for every donation of $50.00 or more you will receive a Youth Legacy Sports T-shirt. 
 The Impact

This year we have conducted three sucessful free football fundemental training camps under the direction of NFL Legend Everson Walls. An article about Youth Legacy Sports was featured in Lake Highlands Today (http://www.lakehighlandstoday.com/index.php/sports/article/legacy_youth_is_bigger_than_sports/) ,

story:
Our six year old nephew Dawson Sangster was diagnosed at the age of five with Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia, a cancer of the blood cells.  Dawson is undergoing extensive chemotherapy which means a lot of time in the hospital for this little man,   fighting this life threatening disease.

Dawson lives with his mother Terria (my husband's sister and my sister-in-law) and his little brother Cayden, in a little community of BeaverBank, Nova Scotia, Canada.

It has been a hard year financially for them struggling to make ends meat and trying to pay for medical expenses on the limited income they have to live on.  Sometimes barely being able to pay for Dawson's medications he needs to help him fight this cancer.  He is prone to infections, that can lead to serious complications for him.

Dawson has spent a lot of time in an out of the hospital, and all he wants is to be a healthy little boy.

Dawson recently received his wish from the Make -A- Wish Foundation, a trip to Disneyland for him, his little brother and his mother.

As a family we have united around Dawson as he battles this cancer, and we strive to make life easy for him.

Please help us in raising $10,000 in much needed funds to help cover Dawson's medical expenses, so he can beat this terrible disease and live a healthy life.

Thank you,

Scott & Gary Kent, Terria, Dawson, & Cayden Sangster

For more inquiries please contact me at garscott@telus.net

story:
Update - Kickstarter Campaign: http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1342319572/the-nifty-minidrive

 

Buy your Nifty MiniDrive here: http://theniftyminidrive.com/

 

What is the Nifty MiniDrive?

 

The Nifty Mini Drive is the most compact storage device available for the MacBook Pro and Macbook Air, and also functions as a complete back-up solution for your most important files.

Machined from aircraft grade aluminium to match the body of your MacBook, the Nifty MiniDrive is designed to fit snugly inside your Mac's SD slot. Housing room for a Micro SD-card, it can instantly increase your Mac's storage by up to 64GB, providing a safe and secure place to back up and store the things that matter to you most. That's enough room for 12,000 songs, 45 HD films or 40,000 high quality photos!

 

 

 _ _ _ _ _ ­­_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

 

Why the Nifty MiniDrive?

 

  • Constant Backup

The Nifty MiniDrive is so much more than just extra storage for your Mac. It is also a complete backup solution for your most important files. Plug it in and forget about it, safe in the knowledge that your most important files are effortlessly and securely being backed up to the Nifty MiniDrive.

 

  • Beautifully Designed. Just like your MacBook.

Whittled down from a single piece of aluminium, the Nifty MiniDrive looks polished and refined to the eye, and feels strong and durable in the hand. Sitting flush in the SD card slot, it blends in seamlessly with the Mac's aluminium unibody and is perfect for storing those files that you just can't do without.

 

  • Safe, Secure Storage

Encased in plastic, and completely water and air tight, the average Micro SD-card is about as rugged as it gets. The Nifty MiniDrive takes advantage of this robust design to provide you with a storage option that ensures your data is safe and secure.

 

  • Elegantly Simple

Simply pop a Micro SD-card in the Nifty MiniDrive and insert into your Mac's SD-card slot. That's 64GB of additional storage that you can start using instantly - it's as simple as that.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ 

 

 What you get

 

  • $55 – You'll get a first edition Nifty MiniDrive with your engraved intials and a unique serial number
  • $99 – You'll get a first edition Nifty MiniDrive in your choice of colour, with your engraved intials and a unique serial number.

 

Those are the basic offerings but there are several more options with additonal bells and whistles. And, even if you don't intend to buy a Nifty MiniDrive now, we are giving away a range of perks and goodies to show our appreciation for all your contributions. Please take a look at the section along the right hand side for more information.

 

And don't forget, all MiniDrives we ship as a result of a pledge have a 3 year extended warranty, subject to the UK’s terms and conditions of sale. We will cover all international sales too, but you will have to post it back to the UK if it needs fixing.

 

*Nifty MiniDrives do not come with a Micro SD-card included. To save you the 9% fee Indiegogo charges on donations, we suggest that you buy your 64GB Micro-SD cards from Amazon (we don't get anything for directing you to this brand, we just think it is the best!). Please follow the link below:

http://www.amazon.co.uk/SanDisk-Mobile-MicroSDXC-Memory-Adapter/dp/B005LFT40G

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

 

Who we are

 

The Nifty MiniDrive was conceived with one thing in mind: pairing the need for extra storage in the MacBook with a design aesthetic worthy of Apple products. We are just two friends who wanted to create something practical that looks damn good.

Please join us on this journey! You will be helping a young company get on its feet for which you cannot underestimate our appreciation. But more importantly you will be part of bringing something useful and beautiful to the world.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

 

What we need

 

Our project goal is US$20,000 and is the bare minimum we need to really get this idea off the ground. Your funding will go towards helping us reach the following important milestones:

  1. Sourcing and testing the raw materials
  2. Making the first, fully operational prototypes. This will include money for:
    • CNC’d aluminum backs
    • Double layer PCB’s
    • Acrylic/Nylon Molded fronts
  3. Placing an order of sufficient volume to scale manufacturing costs
  4. Packaging and Shipping
 
However - if we don't reach our funding goal, we will either ship you a Nifty MiniDrive (if that is what you have ordered), or send a full refund, less the 9% indiegogo fee and paypal fees. We wouldn't want you going away empty handed!!

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

 

Why is it so expensive?

 

We wanted to make the MiniDrive look and feel as high-quality, and as well put together as the MacBook. That meant only one material would do - aircraft grade aluminium. Each MiniDrive is individually machined out of a block of this aluminium using a precision engineering process which gives a high-quality, durable and unique final product. Unfortunately, at low volumes, this is (really) expensive!!

Finally, the MiniDrive is then assembled by hand before being tested and shipped. In these early stages we want to make absolutely sure the quality and finish is to a standard you would be proud to own.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

 

Other ways you can help

 

Please spread the word about this as much as you can! Know someone with a blog? Poke them until they put something nice up about the MiniDrive. Do you run a media empire or know someone who does? Buy a MiniDrive. Then get the word out!

Seriously though folks. This isn’t going to even get off the ground without your help. If you have pledged, thank you! But don’t forget to please spread the love too! Let’s make it happen!

Thank you for reading all this and we hope to be sending you a thank you postcard soon!

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

story:
Toys For Sick Tots

My wife and I are raising money over the next two weeks to buy Christmas presents for over 200 kids that will be spending the holidays at Columbia Presbyterian Children's Hospital. These kids range in age from newborns to 18, and many of them come from families with very little means.
 
All funds will go directly toward toys, games, electronics, crafts and other personal items that will be delivered in time for Christmas.

Let's make sure Santa has plenty to give.

Click the CONTRIBUTE NOW button and give whatever you can!

And help me get the word out by reposting this link: www.indiegogo.com/toysforsicktots

Thanks!

story:
In February 2013, Jared Ellis had a horrible accident with a table saw and lost (Update: injured) 3 of his fingers. He was rushed to the hospital and underwent immediate surgery. He has a long road of recovery ahead of him.

There are not many people like Jared and Ruthie in this world. Jared is an amazing husband, father and friend to many. The irony in this accident is how much Jared has helped others with the work of his hands. Jared and Ruthie Ellis are the epitome of self-sacrificial love.  They have had a profound impact on many lives by helping to rebuild after hurricane Katrina, assisting orphans in Africa, and making personal sacrifices in order to build and contribute to communities across the country.   It is clear that Jared and Ruthie have dedicated their lives to helping others.

Now it is our turn to help them.  Jared and Ruthie will face enormous medical costs related to his injury, and Jared's path to learning to function with his new limitations will certainly mean time away from work. They have a 2 year old son and are expecting their second child later this year.  Jared's recovery will be challenging on its own, and it is important that he is able to simultaneously heal and care for his new baby.  Your financial assistance will ease his path to recovery.

What We Need

Jared and Ruthie do not have medical insurance. Their medical bills will be large, and Jared will be unable to work for quite some time. Our goal is to raise as much money as possible to take the burden of medical bills and money off of their shoulders. They will be receiving every penny contributed to this fundraiser. We hope that they will be able to focus on recovering and preparing for their new child. 

It has not yet been determined how many more surgeries Jared will need until he can start his road to recovery. The amount of money required to cover Jared's expenses is unclear because the injury is so recent.  We have set an initial target of $5000 in order to provide assistance quickly.  It is likely that the expenses will continue to grow beyond the fundraiser target.

The Impact

By donating you will make a huge impact in their lives. We, as a community of people who care for Jared and Ruthie, have an opportunity to help them in a big way.  For this fundraiser to be successful, we are depending on the support of the communities Jared and Ruthie have touched.  The impact of this assistance depends on us, his friends, family, and loved ones.  If we each give a little, together we will play a big part in assisting in their recovery.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can’t contribute. That doesn’t mean you can’t help! Please spread the word and feel free to pass this on to others. Post the link to this page on facebook, share it on twitter, or email it to everyone you know.  Let people know how important Jared is to you. Please help us give back to these wonderfully generous people. 

We love Jared!

*All proceeds will go directly to Jared and Ruthie Ellis.

story:
Ok, So I am new to this. Never done anything like this. I don't even use Facebook. However I need some help. Here is the reason I am on here.

Sarah 27 years old. This is my Sister and Mother to my Nephew. She is a Grandaughter, a Great Granddaughter an Aunt and an all around Angel. My Sister was diagnosed with Melanoma a type of Skin cancer that if left untreated can be deadly. She has been in for two treatments so far that involve alot of pain, cutting and scarring. The problem being is she has no Health Insurance and is on the verge of losing her home. She has the choice of either spending her paycheck on her home or treatments. She is a hard working Mom. She is struggling to make the money for treatments and if left untreated it will progress.

She is not the type of person to ask for money or help so I am going to do it for. I want her to be able to know she is going to be able to afford to get the help she needs and keep a roof over her head. I know she is having troubles with all of it and I don't want to see her worry and suffer anymore.

It hurts me to see her like this. It bothers me that she is going to be scarred, it doesn't seem fair. If I could switch places with her I would but I know its not going to happen. But I'm here to support her and I know she is strong and can do this.

 

My goal is to earn enough help that it will pay for her treatments and leave her with enough of her pay check to cover her mortgage and utilities, food etc.

I love my sister, she has a heart of gold. She is an honest, loving, caring person. She has been there for every member of my family at different points of our lives. She would give the shirt off her back for someone that needed help. 

I don't know why bad things happen to good people. Maybe its a test of someones strengths. It's are human nature to survive and she is a surviver. I know she will make it through this and times are tough for everyone. But with a little help, I honestly think it will go a long way. Any little bit helps and will be truely appreciated and used for a good cause.

 

Thank you for taking the time to stop and help if you can.

 

Thank you!

 

Her brother Justin

story:
WHY HAVE SO MANY PLUCKIN' BEAUTY TOOLS WHEN YOU CAN HAVE EVERYTHING IN ONE?


Pluck N’ File is clearly the all-purpose multi-functional beauty tool that combines a tweezer, a replaceable nail file, nail buffer, and eyebrow comb.                                                         

The first cosmetic tweezer you can customize, interchange and refill to fit your on-the-go lifestyle


IT'S A PROBLEM SOLVER!

No more time wasted searching for four separate beauty items. Those days are gone!




THE DESIGN & SOLUTION

Maximum Function, Minimal Size 
all-in-one stylish tool. 



It’s the ultimate beauty tool that makes the everyday beauty regimen that much more seamless. Four vital beauty items are brought together in one sleek and stylish apparatus.



Super easy to find and beyond easy to use!


Pluck N’ File proves that every woman can have the beauty items she needs literally at her fingertips. There’s no need to waste time looking for or spending the money on countless items only for them to get misplaced and never used. 




Time is of the essence for all busy women and that’s why Pluck N’ File is the successful all-in-one item that’s functional, fun, convenient, stylish, and customizable.  The files and buffers will come in different styles and patterns so you can customize yours however you like.


It’s the go-to product for those daily beauty touch ups free of the hassle and extra money spent. Cut the cost and the waste with Pluck N’ File. 




FILES AND BUFFERS ARE EASY TO REPLACE.  

To remove, simply grab the file or buffer and slide out. 

To replace, grab your new file or buffer, press and slide in.


Ladies, I know you are all asking yourself "is the tweezer quality any good?" and to answer your question, the tweezer is GREAT!  Trust me, I know how important a good tweezer is, and finding the best quality tweezer I could find took me a lot of time.  But I'm happy to say it's excellent! 





PERFECT FOR YOUR MAKEUP BAG

  • Are you sick and tired of digging through your makeup bag for multiple items? We were and we have your solution.  Put Pluck N' File in your makeup bag as your go-to solution.  Save yourself the hassle and keep it simple. 



KEEP ONE IN YOUR PURSE 

  • Who doesn't carry everything they need in their purse only to then look for what they want and they can't find anything because there are too many things and it's cluttered!  With Pluck N' File it's simple because everything is in 1 easy tool.  Save time, space, and aggravation!



KEEP ONE IN YOUR CAR

  • How many times have you chipped your nail while you're running around and needed a nail file? I know I have! Keeping one in your car is the perfect solution, this way it's always right there when you need it.  And not to mention, the sunlight during the day is the perfect place to pluck any hairs...only when you're parked of course! 




KEEP ONE IN YOUR TRAVEL BAG 

  • Have you ever forgotten to bring your tweezers and nail files on a trip? Only to get to your destination and realize you left everything at home? Throw Pluck N' File into your travel kit and never have that problem again. 



WHAT YOU GET FOR HELPING 

Some awesome PLUCKIN' PERKS! In return for your help, you will be getting exclusive discounts and will be able to buy Pluck N' File for less than what it would cost you when you buy Pluck N' File in the store or online.  So don't hesitate to get in on the action. Be the first to own this super beauty tool before it becomes available to the public. 




WHY I CREATED PLUCK N' FILE

We live our lives on-the-go and carrying around multiple beauty items is a major drag. We carry around enough stuff!  We knew there had to be a better way.





We were tired of buying multiple products with pre-chosen colors. Pluck N' File's nail buffers and nail files will come in a variety of different designs and colors. With Pluck N' File , you're in charge!



It was a no brainer to create a cosmetic beauty tool that you can refill and reuse so you can look good and be environmentally friendly at the same time. 






WHERE WE'RE AT 

We have our design finalized and we're ready to move into full production, however, manufacturers require expensive tooling and large order quantities.  There are multiple parts that go into making Pluck N' File. We have a world class manufacturer who is standing by and ready to coordinate all stages of production and logistics.  



WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP 

Your contribution will help us fund our manufacturing costs so we can bring Pluck N' File to market.   Any pledge amount will help bring us one step closer to our goal. 

We can’t wait to get Pluck N' File into your hands. Our manufacturing partner has received the design and is ready to start. Once we reach our goal, we’ll use the contributions to finance the tooling process, large order quantities,  and the first production runs.  Along the way we’ll keep you posted on our progress. Exciting!


RISKS AND CHALLENGES 

Today, we are extremely happy with the design, functionality, and quality of Pluck N' File.  As we progress into tooling and full scale manufacturing, minor adjustments that affect the production schedule may need to be made in order to ensure you receive the highest quality product. 


FULFILLMENT 

Sometimes things go awry that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, a machine breaks down, or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. To minimize the possibility of manufacturing setbacks we will enter the manufacturing stage with at least one backup supplier for each component pre-determined and my product commercialization experts will help ensure smooth sailing from our suppliers and factories.


OTHER WAYS TO HELP 

There are many ways to support us! Even if you can't contribute right now, you can help us turn PLUCK N' FILE into a reality by sharing this Indiegogo campaign with your friends, family, co-workers and even strangers! Spread the word via Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and other social media to let the world know about PLUCK N' FILE!






MEET THE PLUCKIN' FOUNDER 

Dawn M. Sole thought of Pluck N’ File when she was grocery shopping and carrying several grocery bags to her car and when she opened her car door, she chipped her nail. A small problem, to be sure, but one that is multiplied by millions of women. She had to look through her large purse to find a nail file.  Once she filed her nail, she had to go back into her purse a second time to find her nail buffer.  Because she was outside in the bright/perfect sun light,  she wanted to pluck her eyebrows,  which meant going back into her large purse a THIRD time. That is when the ah-ha! moment came… she wanted all these items in one simple tool.  So instead of ignoring the problem, she created a solution which is how Pluck N’ File was born.
