story:
Related report: Ozone nano-bubble water: Potential treatment for severe gum infections

Although the food industry, dentistry, and five-star hotels have been using ozone for sterilizing and deodorizing for a long time, it is not easy for most people to apply ozone to their daily lives. Nowadays, most commercial ozone generators may produce harmful substances such as nitrogen oxides when producing ozone. Another problem is that they generate ozone in air form first and then try to dissolve it in water, but ozone won't dissolve in water well with such an approach. As a result, it takes a longer time to produce ozone water, and people need to sidestep from the spot when the machine is making ozone. Moreover, the relatively lower proportion of ozone dissolved in water leads to  the reduced sterilization effect accordingly. Those machines are also too bulky to carry around.

With the vision of utilizing ozone to substitute current toxic disinfectant products, we spent two years developing this ideal electrolysis device. We use electrolysis to produce ozone DIRECTLY from water, achieving a high solubility of ozone in water, and easily controlling the concentration according to the needs. With our approach, the only byproduct is hydrogen and oxygen (ozone becomes oxygen after reduction), no any harmful substances. BlueO3O3O3 does not require any consumables and is easy to carry around. It is ready for your use whenever you go abroad, mountain climbing, or need a non-toxic mouthwash.

BlueO3O3O3 uses titanium metal with tin oxide semiconductor coating for the anode, and 316L medical stainless steel for the cathode. While the anode generates ozone in water, the cathode produces hydrogen, and the mixture of the two becomes ozone water.

 

Making a visible oxidation demonstration: this time-lapse video shows ozone oxidates the blue in ink within 4 minutes. The water at the end looks greyish because the black in ink(carbon dust) is still in the water.
 

BlueO3O3O3 is making ozone.

 

Ozone is one of the most potent oxidants on the planet, and abroad-spectrum, high-level, fast disinfectant too. Studies show that at 0.1~0.2mg/L concentration, ozone water kills bacteria. The sterilization speed is 600~3000 times faster than chlorine and other fungicides. When the concentration reaches 0.4mg/L, it can kill viruses. It is also recognized worldwide one of the most eco-friendly disinfectants, converting into oxygen after reduction, with no any residues or secondary pollutions.

What Can Ozone Water Do

BlueO3O3O3 generates ozone water ready to provide the following four effects to improve the quality of your life.

Ozone kills Aspergillus flavus, Escherichia coli, Lactobacillus fermentum, Leuconostoc, Listeria, mold, Mycobacterium tuberculosis, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Salmonella, Shigella, Staphylococcus aureus, Streptococcus, Streptococcus thermophilus, Vibrio cholerae, and hundreds more.

It prevents cross-infection of influenza, hand, foot, and mouth disease (HFMD), and other infectious diseases, preventing vomiting and diarrhea caused by food contaminated with bacteria.

Hotels and water departments have been using ozone for deodorization and disinfection for a long time, and now you can easily use ozone to remove odors at home.

Ozone kills S. mutans and other bacteria related to dental caries. Ozone is also commonly used in dentistry for oral cavity disinfection.

Related report: Ozone nano-bubble water: Potential treatment for severe gum infections

Ozone has been given GRAS (Generally Recognized as Safe) approval by the USDA and the FDA for direct contact with food products. It has also been widely used for sterilization in poultry products, vegetables, and bottled water.

 

One BlueO3O3O3 can replace all types of chemical mouthwash. Ozone water has an outstanding sterilization effect and can penetrate thoroughly between the tooth-gaps, giving you fresh breath, helping to maintain your oral health without causing environmental pollution.

Related report: Ozone nano-bubble water: Potential treatment for severe gum infections

 

The ozone water made with BlueO3O3O3 is all natural and eco-friendly. It can directly and safely clean baby bottles, pacifiers, straw cups, toys and more, effectively sterilizing harmful bacteria and preventing cross-infection of influenza, hand, foot, and mouth disease (HFND), and other infectious diseases.

Ozone water is an effective and economical way to sterilize pets and aquarium supplies. Be careful not to apply ozone water to the pets and the aquatic animals directly.

 

When it comes to seafood, whether it is freshly fished or farmed, there are always some bacteria attached to the surface. Meat products have the same problem. Many bacteria grow during the production process and secondary processing. You can enhance the hygiene and freshness-retaining of meat/fish by utilizing ozone's potent sterilizing ability.

Although vegetables and fruits are harvested from the mother plants, they are still living organisms. They automatically release ripening enzymes and the interaction between mold and yeast accelerates the harvested fruits and vegetables matured and rotted. Ozone water can oxidize the ripening enzymes to decompose into ethylene oxide which inhibits mold and yeast, prolonging the freshness of fruits and vegetables.

 

Ozone water penetrates all the hard-to-clean small gaps, such as straws, swan neck kettle, coffee machine, wood bowls and wood table sets, humidifier, and blender, etc.

The thermos or straws can grow a greasy surface after using, it’s kind of like the greasy surface when you ordinarily lick your teeth. The greasy surface actually is a thin layer of bacteria. Ozone water can remove the greasy surface (sterilization) without scratching the thermos or straws. You can feel the before & after touch difference.

Use ozone water regularly on plants can eliminate harmful bacteria of the soil and on the surface of the plants, maintaining hygiene, and promoting healthy plants.

 

Put BlueO3O3O3 into 250 ml of water at room temperature. The room temperature should be between 5℃~35℃ (30℉~95℉). The maximum water level is 20 mm below the power button, and the minimum water level must be 5 mm above the air holes. BlueO3O3O3 cannot electrolyze mineral-lacking water, like pure water or reverse osmosis water. In such cases, you can add a little salt to the water.

Press the "power button" once, the product works for 2 minutes. Continuously press twice, the product works for 4 minutes.
2-minute mode (ozone concentration 0.45~0.6 mg/L): oral cleaning.
4-minute mode (ozone concentration 0.75~0.9 mg/L): all other suggestive usage as mentioned above.

The LED indicator appears green when BlueO3O3O3 is working(making ozone), and you can notice tiny bubbles from the air holes. When it finishes working, the power turns off automatically, and the LED indicator turns off too.

After use, remove BlueO3O3O3 from the water, gently wiping off droplets on the surface.

BlueO3O3O3 can work continuously. You don't need to pause between a working duration and another. However, the maximum time for BlueO3O3O3 placed in water is 40 minutes, and you need to remove BlueO3O3O3 from the water when it reaches 40 minutes.

At room temperature, the ozone in water returns to oxygen after 10 minutes through reduction. Therefore, you can use ozone water to sterilize in these ten minutes.

There are different ways to apply ozone water to targets. For oral cleaning, use BlueO3O3O3 to make ozone water and then use it as a regular mouthwash. For sterilizing small objects, put those objects directly into the water before and during the 4 min working duration of making ozone. When the 4 min finishes, the objects also complete their sterilization. For sterilizing larger areas, put the ozone water into a spray bottle, keep spraying the target until the water runs out (about 3-5 min).

If BlueO3O3O3 leaves the water during a working duration, it automatically powers off within a few seconds. The same applies if you accidentally press the "power button”, BlueO3O3O3 automatically detects its environment and powers off if not in water.

 

BlueO3O3O3 is not a medical device.​

It takes about 60 minutes for BlueO3O3O3 to be fully charged. Once fully charged, the battery can let BlueO3O3O3 work up to 50 minutes. Do not charge BlueO3O3O3 when it is working or in the water.

It is recommended not to charge and discharge the battery multiple times a day to extend battery life. Therefore the recommended total working time for BlueO3O3O3 within 24 hours is 50 minutes.

 

The ozone water that has just created (high concentration) is mainly used for sterilization and is not suitable for drinking. However, after ten minutes of reduction, ozone is converted to oxygen and becomes oxygen-rich water, which is very suitable for drinking. After ten minutes, the ozone concentration, if not none, is far below the standard that can cause harm to humans. So, you can confidently use our product to sterilize drinking water.

Body temperature accelerates the conversion of ozone to oxygen, so when using ozone water as a mouthwash, there is no need to worry about ozone remaining in the mouth.

The SGS reports show that at room temperature (25℃ or so), after contacting the ozone water made by BlueO3O3O3 for 4 minutes, the reduction rates of both Escherichia coli and Staphylococcus aureus are over 99.9%.

 

We are a design team called Friendly Life. "Friendly Life" is the name of our team and is also the ultimate philosophy we pursue. Our goal is to keep improving the user experience of living through creativity and design. We hope that there are always good products to accompany you, and you enjoy a relaxing and quality life.
story_txt: Related report: Ozone nano-bubble water: Potential treatment for severe gum infectionsAlthough the food industry, dentistry, and five-star hotels have been using ozone for sterilizing and deodorizing for a long time, it is not easy for most people to apply ozone to their daily lives. Nowadays, most commercial ozone generators may produce harmful substances such as nitrogen oxides when producing ozone. Another problem is that they generate ozone in air form first and then try to dissolve it in water, but ozone won't dissolve in water well with such an approach. As a result, it takes a longer time to produce ozone water, and people need to sidestep from the spot when the machine is making ozone. Moreover, the relatively lower proportion of ozone dissolved in water leads to  the reduced sterilization effect accordingly. Those machines are also too bulky to carry around.With the vision of utilizing ozone to substitute current toxic disinfectant products, we spent two years developing this ideal electrolysis device. We use electrolysis to produce ozone DIRECTLY from water, achieving a high solubility of ozone in water, and easily controlling the concentration according to the needs. With our approach, the only byproduct is hydrogen and oxygen (ozone becomes oxygen after reduction), no any harmful substances. BlueO3O3O3 does not require any consumables and is easy to carry around. It is ready for your use whenever you go abroad, mountain climbing, or need a non-toxic mouthwash.BlueO3O3O3 uses titanium metal with tin oxide semiconductor coating for the anode, and 316L medical stainless steel for the cathode. While the anode generates ozone in water, the cathode produces hydrogen, and the mixture of the two becomes ozone water. Making a visible oxidation demonstration: this time-lapse video shows ozone oxidates the blue in ink within 4 minutes. The water at the end looks greyish because the black in ink(carbon dust) is still in the water. BlueO3O3O3 is making ozone. Ozone is one of the most potent oxidants on the planet, and abroad-spectrum, high-level, fast disinfectant too. Studies show that at 0.1~0.2mg/L concentration, ozone water kills bacteria. The sterilization speed is 600~3000 times faster than chlorine and other fungicides. When the concentration reaches 0.4mg/L, it can kill viruses. It is also recognized worldwide one of the most eco-friendly disinfectants, converting into oxygen after reduction, with no any residues or secondary pollutions.What Can Ozone Water DoBlueO3O3O3 generates ozone water ready to provide the following four effects to improve the quality of your life.Ozone kills Aspergillus flavus, Escherichia coli, Lactobacillus fermentum, Leuconostoc, Listeria, mold, Mycobacterium tuberculosis, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Salmonella, Shigella, Staphylococcus aureus, Streptococcus, Streptococcus thermophilus, Vibrio cholerae, and hundreds more.It prevents cross-infection of influenza, hand, foot, and mouth disease (HFMD), and other infectious diseases, preventing vomiting and diarrhea caused by food contaminated with bacteria.Hotels and water departments have been using ozone for deodorization and disinfection for a long time, and now you can easily use ozone to remove odors at home.Ozone kills S. mutans and other bacteria related to dental caries. Ozone is also commonly used in dentistry for oral cavity disinfection.Related report: Ozone nano-bubble water: Potential treatment for severe gum infectionsOzone has been given GRAS (Generally Recognized as Safe) approval by the USDA and the FDA for direct contact with food products. It has also been widely used for sterilization in poultry products, vegetables, and bottled water. One BlueO3O3O3 can replace all types of chemical mouthwash. Ozone water has an outstanding sterilization effect and can penetrate thoroughly between the tooth-gaps, giving you fresh breath, helping to maintain your oral health without causing environmental pollution.Related report: Ozone nano-bubble water: Potential treatment for severe gum infections The ozone water made with BlueO3O3O3 is all natural and eco-friendly. It can directly and safely clean baby bottles, pacifiers, straw cups, toys and more, effectively sterilizing harmful bacteria and preventing cross-infection of influenza, hand, foot, and mouth disease (HFND), and other infectious diseases.Ozone water is an effective and economical way to sterilize pets and aquarium supplies. Be careful not to apply ozone water to the pets and the aquatic animals directly. When it comes to seafood, whether it is freshly fished or farmed, there are always some bacteria attached to the surface. Meat products have the same problem. Many bacteria grow during the production process and secondary processing. You can enhance the hygiene and freshness-retaining of meat/fish by utilizing ozone's potent sterilizing ability.Although vegetables and fruits are harvested from the mother plants, they are still living organisms. They automatically release ripening enzymes and the interaction between mold and yeast accelerates the harvested fruits and vegetables matured and rotted. Ozone water can oxidize the ripening enzymes to decompose into ethylene oxide which inhibits mold and yeast, prolonging the freshness of fruits and vegetables. Ozone water penetrates all the hard-to-clean small gaps, such as straws, swan neck kettle, coffee machine, wood bowls and wood table sets, humidifier, and blender, etc.The thermos or straws can grow a greasy surface after using, it’s kind of like the greasy surface when you ordinarily lick your teeth. story:
Our Goal: TODOSxSEBA!

TODOSxSebas is an initiative of the family and friends to achieve the bone marrow transplantation of Sebastián Corbat, who suffers from an unusual genetic disease called XLP.

Our goal is to fundraise U$S 974,000 as fast as possible to achieve the transplantation he needs. Your help, however small, can make a difference and save a life. Go TODOSxSEBA!

About Sebastián

Hello! I am Sebastián Corbat, I am 37 years old and I am married to Angelica; we have two children, Florencia (5) and Vicente (2).

When I was 18 years old I was diagnosed with XLP syndrome, which means lymphoproliferative syndrome genetically transmitted by the X chromosome. Most of the people suffering from this syndrome do not survive the age of 10, being the bone marrow transplantation the only definite cure.

In the particular case of my family, who is the only one known in Argentina with this syndrome, my parents had 8 children, 3 of them died when they were kids due to causes attributed to the XLP syndrome. Only in 1991, when my eldest brother Gustavo was very sick, we discovered that this disease existed within my family. Gustavo underwent transplantation using my sister’s bone marrow at Hospital Británico de Buenos Aires but he died some days after. Now there are only Mariana and Santiago healthy; Gabriel who is 50 years old with hypogammaglobulinemia (he is administered immunogammaglobulin every 4 weeks); and myself with 37 years old. I had been well until I had mononucleosis when I was 26 years old and I had to start with immunogammagloblulin infusions as Gabriel.

With this treatment I was able to live a normal life and without complications until the beginning of this year when due to a general weakness condition I was diagnosed with severe bone marrow aplasia. This means that my bone marrow is generating very few red blood cells, white blood cells and platelets. This could become into a total aplasia, i.e.: my bone marrow will stop generating absolutely everything. Currently, I am under a supporting treatment (transfusions of red blood cells, white blood cells and platelets), waiting for the bone marrow transplantation which will cure the bone marrow aplasia and the XLP syndrome.

As the time goes by, my body is asking for transfusions more often, and therefore, the transplantation should be performed as soon as possible to avoid this condition to become worse.

Unfortunately, there is not any successful experience of (i) transplantations in adults, (ii) with XLP, (iii) with aplastic anemia and (iv) of unrelated donors in South American institutions. We know that without carefully respecting these procedures, there is a small possibility of natural survival. According to the specialists contacted around the world by my family doctor, it is recommended to undergo the treatment in a place where there are doctors with vast experience in institutions specialized in allogenic stem cell transplantation of unrelated donors for aplastic anemia in adults.

The specialists contacted worldwide by my family doctor recommended Seba to undergo the treatment in institutions where there are doctors specialized in allogenic stem cell transplantations of unrelated donors for aplastic anemia in adults.

Nowadays, the only medical team who accepted to follow the case was Dr. Joseph Antin’s team from the Dana Farber Cancer Institute (DFCI), Boston, from more than a dozen of medical teams in USA and Europe who refused. Dana Farber Cancer Institute is offering us a 75% survival chance.

The treatment lasts 12 months and within such period of time I must remain in Boston.

And this is the reason why we started to work hard with my wife, friends and family to make this dream come true, since I want to continue living together with Ange and my children and with your help we can succeed in this difficult stage of our lives.

We are eternally grateful for all type of help you can give us and all the cooperation to spread this page to the most number of people through Twitter, Facebook or Email, everything counts.

With all your small contributions we can make it happen. We need you!!!!

Seba, Ange, Flo y Vico

THANKS A MILLION!!!!!

story:
The Innate Life began on March 2016 in Toronto, Canada as an all-natural, non-toxic, and organic haircare brand. 

After launching our first two products, it wasn't long before positive feedback began flooding in and we gained a loyal following. Harnessing the healing powder of herbs, we were able to help hundreds of people improve their hair health and overcome a number of scalp issues. With such positive feedback, we knew it was time to expand beyond hair care and apply the same philosophy to personal care products.

The Innate Life Box was conceptualized as a way to transition into using all-natural products. Having made the switch ourselves, we know how hard and time-consuming it can be to locate products individually and ensure they are 100% toxin-free. 

Creating clean beauty products is so important to us because we understand the dangers of conventional products. The unfortunate reality is that the government doesn't regulate what goes into our products and the standards for safety are set very low. We want to encourage others to educate themselves and make more informed decisions when buying products. If you’re just beginning your all-natural journey, you’ll be shocked to discover:

With these facts in mind, we have created The Innate Life Box. This box was designed to make the switch to natural products easy and affordable. These 6 products were specifically chosen because they are used on a large surface area of your body and should be swapped out first for all-natural alternatives. By using The Innate Life Box personal care products, you can avoid dozens of harmful chemicals found in regular products. 

 

 

 

We strive to make products that are extremely concentrated, containing dozens of high-quality herbs and botanicals. Herbs play a big role in our formulations because of their natural healing properties. Before western medicine, herbs were used in Ayurvedic practice to bring the body back in balance so that it could heal itself. The herbs we’ve chosen are not only beneficial for your beauty but for your overall health as well.

We believe natural products should look, feel, and smell 100% natural. This is why our products are strictly plant-based with no unnecessary fillers or harsh chemicals. Just take a look at our ingredient lists and you'll see what we mean. 

 

 

Being in control of our product has been a priority from the start. This is why we continue to formulate, manufacture and ship everything in-house. By shipping directly to you, we can ensure the highest quality product with little mark-up. 

It’s also not uncommon for beauty companies to outsource and get the foundation for their recipes from a contract manufacturer. We have chosen to formulate our products from scratch, spending many hours researching and testing our recipes. The final product you receive is carefully handcrafted by us, formulated with the highest quality ingredients and extremely concentrated. 

Developing new products and bringing them to market is an expensive and time-consuming process. Another challenge has been finding the room to expand and doing it all on our own. We need your support to kickstart the process which would otherwise take us years to execute. Your support will help us acquire: 

 

 

 

TO VIEW & DOWNLOAD OUR PRESS RELEASE: THE INNATE LIFE BOX PRESS RELEASE

story:
Hi deep freediving addicts!

 

After the success of our carbon noseclip earlier this year, we are now happy to introduce our new Octopus CNF lanyard (and belt)!

Resulting from several months of development, the final prototype was tested last September in the blue waters of Amorgos in Greece and gave full satisfaction!

You can order either only the belt (including quick release) or the complete set with our lanyard including top grade 360° rotating carbon composite carabiner. 

 

Less drag

We drastically reduced the drag during freefall by using a thin but sturdy belt: polyester with aviation-style weaving, only 1mm thick but able to withstand more than 500kg loads, soft and pleasant to the touch. The carabiner cable being only 3mm in diameter, also contributes to significantly reducing drag.

 

 

Waist positioning

A simple but efficient fastening system between the legs, quick to clip on, ensures that the belt will not move up the waist during your freefall when your suit compresses. This « AUTOLOCK» system does not require applying excessive tension on the elastic band but keeps it softly and comfortably in place without friction between the legs.

 

 

Adjustable size

Both front and back buckles can be positioned exactly according to your body shape, same as for the elastic band which can be cut once you have measured the proper length (by first testing it on your own body).

 

 

Safety

We designed our own ball attached to the quick release, which is easy and quick to grab even when wearing gloves.

 

 

Top quality materials

We are only using marine-grade materials (mainly stainless steel SS316 and polyester).

 

 

In the end, we are introducing a product which is easy to use, ergonomic, drastically reduces drag, and at an affordable price with high-quality components and finish!  Available in in 3 clolors: 

 

 

Be the first to pre-order your new Octopus CNF belt or lanyard, at a great discounted price!!! Production will start in January, and delivery is planned for March 2020.

Enough words, the video speaks for itself!!!

A warm thank you for your support!

Pascal.

 

(except these new ones, all our regular products are available in our webshop www.octopusfreediving.com)

story:
Proinsulitron

Type 1 diabetes is a condition with available solutions based on complicated or expensive devices of external use. We propose the use of an innovative system based on the construction of a bacterial chimera capable of sensing glucose which is coupled with genes related to insulin production and secretion. The bacteria will be placed into a modular device composed by contention, communication, extraction and change sections.

For the design of this device, a biocompatible material was searched for containing the bacteria that senses the glucose, produce and secrete insulin in a secure way. This device is designed specifically to avoid immune response from the patient. Using the designed system for insulin application, mechanical engineering and biotechnology are combined, ensuring an appropriate and secure insulin dosage for the patient.


What is iGEM 



International Genetically Engineered Machine (iGEM) iGEM promotes the generation of novel investigation projects on synthetic biology that generate solutions to problems on a wide spectrum of areas such as health, energy, environment, food, nutrition, data processing and new implementations, among others.

Assisting to this contest would allow us to present our project in an international media, which might produce knowledge and methodological exchange with people from countries with high levels on investigation, while getting support for phase 2 of investigation


Impact

You might have a  relative with diabetes that does not know about their status. According to the international diabetes federation, every 7 seconds one person dies from diabetes.

This is a research done at the National and Autonomous University of Mexico with the colaboration of the  Institute of investigation on Applied Mathematics and Systems, Biomedics Research Center, Institute of Chemestry, Science Faculty, Chemestry Faculty, Medicine Faculty, Genomic Sciences Center and Engineering Faculty.



What we need and what do you get

$2800 are needed for 8 members of our team to travel to the iGEM competition (www.igem.org) in order to represent UNAM. This expenses should include travelling and hotel.

The project intends to help diabetic patients in the world. With your support, their life quality is improved and you boost interdisciplinary research of medicine, engineering, chemestry, biomedicine and pharmaceutics.

Remember that all rewards are accumulative, they may seem small but they mean a lot for a diabetes patient and for us!!!

We intend to get eight members to Boston, if we don't accumulate enough founds, the money collected will be used to send as many members as possible.

If we get more money more options will be added based on our capability to achieve them.




Risks and challenges

Your help is needed  to present our project at the prestigious and international competition iGEM.

The most difficult part (the modification and funcionality of the organism) is already archieved, but our effort will not be fully recognized without reaching our goal of collecting the founds.


Other ways of helping our project

Our project needs to be known by many people interested in contributing. If it is not possible for you to contribute economically, you can share it with your friends and your local health organizations.
story_txt:
Proinsulitron
Type 1
diabetes is a condition with available solutions based on complicated or
expensive devices of external use. We propose the use of an innovative system
based on the construction of a bacterial chimera capable of sensing glucose
which is coupled with genes related to insulin production and secretion. The
bacteria will be placed into a modular device composed by contention,
communication, extraction and change sections. 
For the
design of this device, a biocompatible material was searched for containing the
bacteria that senses the glucose, produce and secrete insulin in a secure way.
This device is designed specifically to avoid immune response from the patient.
Using the designed system for insulin application, mechanical engineering and
biotechnology are combined, ensuring an appropriate and secure insulin dosage
for the patient.What is iGEM International Genetically Engineered Machine (iGEM)
iGEM promotes the generation of novel investigation projects on synthetic biology that generate solutions to problems on a wide spectrum of areas such as health, energy, environment, food, nutrition, data processing and new implementations, among others.Assisting to this contest would allow us to present our project in an international media, which might produce knowledge and methodological exchange with people from countries with high levels on investigation, while getting support for phase 2 of investigation

story:
#ItsMarmaTime

Marma is a movement to provide simpler health solutions for common ailments: inspired on our grandmothers’ remedies, but proven by scientific research and containing the “good karma” ingredient. For every product sold, one child in a developing country will receive medical treatment that can change her or his life.


Marma is a B Corporation with the purpose of researching and identifying more natural health remedies that work and bring them to you, and the mission of increasing funding to organizations that improve human health. We are partnering with Evidence Action, a recognized leader in the health impact sector, to provide deworming treatment to children in developing countries. This treatment is recognized as a “best buy” and transforms their lives because once cured, they are able to go back to school: absenteeism is reduced and in turn, lifetime earnings increase. And our business model doesn’t benefit only developing countries: we partner with homeless support organizations in the US to employ individuals struggling with unemployment/homelessness to conduct the fulfillment of our orders. 


Our Story

David is a science junkie with a finance background who gets a kick out of raising funds for great charities which improve people’s lives through education and health. He has tried everything: silent auctions, wine tastings and even triathlons. He raised almost $30K for awesome organizations, but experienced how difficult it is to raise more money to help more people. He was inspired by the models of TOMS and Warby Parker - which use the power of the free market to invest in doing good.

His two grandmothers were the reason he became interested in health remedies. They grew up 20 miles away from each other, but in very different settings: one in a large city, and the other in a rural setting. His mother was torn between listening to her mother-in-law's big-city doctor advice and following her own mother’s traditional child rearing advice. She ended up combining both approaches, which made him realize that health solutions that really work can be everywhere, what really matters is the underlying scientific proof. 


The Product and Our Campaign

We are launching Marma with the introduction of our first product: Marma Gargle, for sore throat relief. Based on the salt gargle remedy of our grandmothers, the ingredients in Marma Gargle are recognized by the FDA as anti-septic. This comes handy in many cases of sore throat that are due to increased bacterial growth. Many of us know the familiar feeling of waking up with a scratchy feeling, or a long flight (dry air affects our body's ability to fend off infections).

We are ready to start production, but we need your help to reach scale. The goal of this campaign is to receive enough pre-orders to make this a reality and ultimately, change lives. By placing your order and sharing our campaign with your friends, you are helping launch a movement for more natural health solutions that improve more people lives.

The Impact

The mission of Marma is to bring more natural, but proven health solutions to everyone, while making a difference.  The challenge is huge: 870 million children around the world are at risk of parasitic worm infections that can keep them from going to school. Marma wants to develop multiple product lines that fund this and other high-impact health programs.


Our purpose is to change the way capitalism works, to help more people in need. We believe B Corporations such as Marma, have a unique opportunity to grow and achieve large scale impact. At the same time, we want to prove to investors that it is possible to create sustainable businesses that make our world a better place.


Good Karma Has Its Perks!

To launch Marma, we need pre-orders for about 2,500 boxes of Marma Gargle, so we can start production, fulfill those orders and then continue development of our second product. Instead of donations, this campaign is about pre-orders and spreading the word. For every share on social media with the hashtag #ItsMarmaTime, we will donate deworming treatment for one child, up to 1,500.  Instead of spending on marketing, we want to fund as many deworming treatments as possible. These donations will be fulfilled even if we don’t meet our goal.

The proceeds from product orders will go to cover production costs and FDA regulatory expenses. Proceeds from orders beyond 2,500 boxes will help us fund R&D expenses for our next products and expanding the team.



Risks & Challenges

We chose a reputable contract manufacturer with over 40 years of experience with medical and dietary products. They are registered with the appropriate federal and state authorities and meet the FDA CGMP (Current Good Manufacturing Practices) regulations. We believe they exceed the technical requirements to manufacture Marma Gargle with rigorous quality control.

Shipping and handling will be done by individuals who are trying to reenter the job market. Although we are partnering with qualified support organizations, if we experience difficulties in the recruitment or training stages, we may experience shipping delays. Despite any delays, we are confident if we hit our orders goal, you and every other supporter will receive their Marma Gargles and the bliss of good karma.

Other Ways You Can Help

We are launching on Indiegogo because we believe in the power of a community to come together and build something towards a common goal. This is not only about launching a health product company, but making a significant difference in as many people’s lives as possible.

Remember: When you place an order through a Perk, or share our campaign on social media with the hashtag #ItsMarmaTime you are making an impact and helping improve a human life. That is the motivation that drives us to create more products and launch this movement. Don’t forget to create an Indiegogo account when sharing the campaign - we have exciting plans ahead and want you to be a part of it!

Thanks for joining us!

story:
Hey there, squadmates! We are thrilled to introduce you to POMSQUAD Fitness! 

POMSQUAD Fitness is a super-fun, immensely positive, high-energy dance fitness format brought to you by co-creators and Head Coaches Jena Ertel (aka The Jenarator) and Matthew Hollis (aka Mattrick Swayze). Inclusive, encouraging, and easy-to-follow classes are designed to maximize caloric burn, while strengthening and toning muscles.  

Here at POMSQUAD Fitness, we are passionate about wellness, community and creating a "safe" dance space for people to test their physical limits. We want as many people as possible to LOVE and benefit from this fitness format, which is why we are expanding the squad. In order to effectively expand our footprint both regionally and nationally, we need your help to get our grassroots funding off the ground!

Curious what it's like to take one of our classes? Check out a sample of one of our favorite routines here!


Our $10,000 funding goal will help us implement critical parts of our expansion strategy, including:

Expanding the Squad:

  • Upgrading and refreshing training materials to certify more active instructors in POMSQUAD Fitness
  • Creating a professionally shot promotional video to introduce POMSQUAD Fitness to fitness professionals, studios and national gyms
Expanding Our Reach:
  • Completing POMSQUAD Fitness website upgrades
  • Launching our online library for squadmates far and wide to access at home
Expanding Our Influence:
  • Obtaining AFAA/NASM and ACE accreditation for our certification program
  • Accessing impactful regional and national fitness conventions
Expanding the Sound:
  • Purchasing BMI and ASCAP music licensing
How can your individual contribution make a difference? If 25 people contribute $100 and receive our Featured "Junior Varsity" perk, POMSQUAD Fitness can produce and edit a professional promotional video to share with people in the fitness community. Donate $150 at the "Bows and Stunts" level, and cover our AFAA/NASM accreditation. Any way you look at it, your support helps us in big ways!

Ready to join the squad? We put our heads together to bring you creative and fun perks to keep you shaking your poms with us!

Whether you choose a $5 or $2,000 contribution, we will keep you "in the spirit" with our incentives long after our campaign has ended.  From merchandise to class passes, online routine access and event entertainment, we have perks that comfortably fit every contribution level.  What's better motivation for giving than getting free Sunday classes with Matthew and Jena for LIFE?

With extensive fitness experience and expertise, Jena and Matthew have learned that the mind-body connection is crucial to emotional and physical wellness. The POMSQUAD Fitness format integrates community and positivity into its delivery, benefiting participants far beyond just physical transformation. 

Without fail, people leave our classes feeling successful, sweaty and stronger. We want MORE people to have the opportunity to experience the euphoric post-POMSQUAD Fitness class glow! With your contributions, POMSQUAD Fitness will be able to extend its reach beyond its Chicago headquarters. 

We know there are a lot of fitness choices out there. Here are some features that make POMSQUAD Fitness stand out in the fitness industry:

  • Inclusivity: Being welcoming and "immensely positive" is part of our mission statement. We want everyone at every fitness level to feel at home. So while  our format is "cheer-based," meaning there are poms and an occasional call-and-response opportunity, it's mostly about DANCE. Rest assured, there is no lifting, throwing, or flips. Just hot moves to cool tunes with rad people 
  • Novelty: POMSQUAD Fitness seamlessly incorporates poms into its choreography, which not only offers our squadmates strength-training elements, and offers participants novelty and fun while they work out. 
  • Variation: POMSQUAD Fitness choreographers do not limit content creation to certain genres of music or dance. Through several different types of dance team and "cheer" moves, POMSQUAD movements incorporate variety to keep your body from hitting that dreaded plateau!
  • Focus on Holistic Fitness: Here at POMSQUAD Fitness Headquarters, we are committed to thoughtfully creating routines and classes that offer diverse elements of fitness which focus on inner and outer strength. We incorporate plyometrics to increase power [jumps!], resistance training [poms!] to build muscle and bone mass, varying levels of cardiovascular intensity for conditioning, and repetitive movement for memory retention. It is truly a holistic workout that makes 60 minutes fly by!

Even if you aren't able to contribute financially, we would love it if you would help us spread the word about the POMSQUAD Fitness Launch Campaign!

Social media is a key part of our communication strategy, and we know that you're pretty popular! Make sure to use the super handy-dandy Indiegogo share tools and post to your network early and often. We love you all! Thank you!

story:
To make high-end beauty products affordable to all. We were tired of the insane costs of beauty products, but we recognize the importance of quality formulas and ingredients. We thought there had to be a better way. So, we decided to do things differently. 

 

You will save hundreds to thousands of dollars a year on beauty products. With our model, we are cutting out 3-4 markups that typically occur with other beauty brands. By doing this, we are saving you loads of money that you can now spend on other things, like Netflix binging and Chunky Monkey ice cream! 

How you might ask? You buy products for the same price it costs us to make them. We will sell you all our beauty products at-cost. This means we will make ZERO profit on the products. We will simply make money through the small membership fees.

USA Factory Partner. We partnered with a local U.S. manufacturer located in Utah to formulate and deliver the best products possible. These products would normally sell anywhere from $35 to $135 with other beauty brands.

LIKE WHAT YOU SEE?!? Hit this button to help us!

 

 

Because you are taking a chance on us, we're offering you a deal of a lifetime, literally! This campaign will be the only time you'll be able to get a lifetime membership. Yes, you read that right. You back us today for a small one-time fee and you will be a DIME member for the rest of your life. FOR. EV. ER. Anyone who joins after the campaign, will choose from a monthly or annual fee. In addition, we are also offering the following options:

$19 - One-Year Membership ($80 off retail)

$7 - 1 Lip Plumper ($23 off retail)

$8 - 1 Facial Cleanser ($27 off retail)

$10 - 1 Facial Toner ($30 off retail)

$12 - 1 Day Cream ($38 off retail)

$14 - 1 Night Cream ($46 off retail)

$20 - 1 Eyelash Growth Serum ($80 off retail)

Here's what the savings will look like for members: 

If you bought each product only one time a year you would save... 

For example, if you just buy 1 eyelash growth serum and 1 day cream all year long, you will save $119.01! That alone will make the annual membership worth it! 

WANT THOSE SAVINGS? Hit this button!

 

 

We will be launching with 11 products. Following our campaign, we will then release new products every month to few months, ensuring that members have a wide variety of product options to choose from. 

Aside from the savings we are passing onto you, we also wanted to ensure that each product we develop is top of the line and will be formulas that produce results. We will not compromise quality.

 

Facial Cleanser

Day Cream

Night Cream

Anti-Aging Cream

Facial Toner

Body Cream

Body Scrub

Whitening Toothpaste

Plumping Lip Gloss

Eyelash Growth Serum

Mascara

 

In addition to high quality formulas and at-cost pricing, all our products will meet the following criteria: 

We want our brand and products to make a difference, but we also want them to be kind to the environment. We strive to use post-consumer resin and bioplastics in whatever packaging we can. This means they are much easier on the environment and 100% recyclable. We are always doing what we can to be more environmentally friendly.  

By keeping things local and making our products here in the U.S, we're also keeping our carbon footprint down.

 

LOVE OUR PRODUCT CRITERIA? Help make the world a better place by hitting this button!

 

Why are we choosing a membership model instead of a traditional subscription model? Here's why: 

Because of the nature of the industry, the minimum order quantities for both packaging and products are high. We need the money to place the first orders for the packaging and the product bulk. Starting a business like this requires quite a bit of up-front cost. Which is why we are asking for your help! We need your help to jump-start DIME Beauty so we can make high-end beauty products affordable to all! 

 

Baylee is a licensed master esthetician. She received her education and training from the National Institute of Medical Aesthetics. With her broad knowledge of the skin care and beauty industries, she continuously stays up-to-date on the best performing products on the market. However, Baylee soon recognized that quality products are very expensive. She thought there was a better way. She thinks you shouldn't have to break the bank to take care of your skin and look your best.   

Luckily, her husband has a product development background in the skin care and beauty industries. A match made in heaven. So, she utilized her resources to develop a unique membership-based brand that offers high-end skin care and beauty products at-cost. Members, or DIMES, will have access to these prices for a low membership fee.

 

 

GET THESE REWARDS! Hit this button right now! 

 

 

 

So, back us today and become part of a beauty brand that is disrupting the industry! Get the highest quality beauty products for at-cost pricing! 

We are excited to have you with us!

Will the lifetime membership really last forever?   

Yes! You’ll be able to access all our products at-cost for the rest of your life. This is how we’re kickstarting the brand. Everyone else will pay a monthly or annual membership like Costco.  

If you’re selling at cost how do you make money?  

We make money through the memberships sales: we cover our costs of product sales and make the profit on the small membership fee.

What is the difference between getting a membership on Indiegogo or doing it through your website?  

Everything else after this campaign will be monthly or yearly memberships.

When will I be able to start using my membership?  

You will receive an email to activate the membership at the beginning of Oct. 2018.

Is DIME Beauty a subscription box? Will I get a box with your products every month?

Nope! You can shop on our site dimebeautyco.com and choose the items you would like, whenever you want.  

How does shipping work?  

You will pay for shipping unless you spend over $35. If you do spend over $35, shipping will be FREE. For international orders, the shipping cost will depend on your location and the size of the package.  

Exactly what ingredients are in each product?  

Those are listed on our site at dimebeautyco.com

Where are the products made?  

All of our products are made in Utah, USA.

How much will your products cost members?

Check our member pricing list above or you can visit dimebeautyco.com to check the price of each product.

Do you test products on animals?  

No, we never do. All of our products are 100% cruelty-free.

WE ANSWERED ALL YOUR QUESTIONS! So, hit this button to back us today!

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Because we have formed a strategic partnership with a manufacturing plant we are confident we will be able to deliver our products on time as promised. We've already had a successful small batch production run without any glitches. During production we'll be on-site to ensure that our high-quality standards are met. 

If in the off chance there are setbacks, we will always keep you informed with frequent, transparent updates along the way.

These products would normally sell anywhere from $35 to $135 with other beauty brands.LIKE WHAT YOU SEE?!? Hit this button to help us!  Because you are taking a chance on us, we're offering you a deal of a lifetime, literally! This campaign will be the only time you'll be able to get a lifetime membership. Yes, you read that right. You back us today for a small one-time fee and you will be a DIME member for the rest of your life. FOR. EV. ER. Anyone who joins after the campaign, will choose from a monthly or annual fee. In addition, we are also offering the following options:$19 - One-Year Membership ($80 off retail)$7 - 1 Lip Plumper ($23 off retail)$8 - 1 Facial Cleanser ($27 off retail)$10 - 1 Facial Toner ($30 off retail)$12 - 1 Day Cream ($38 off retail)$14 - 1 Night Cream ($46 off retail)$20 - 1 Eyelash Growth Serum ($80 off retail)Here's what the savings will look like for members: If you bought each product only one time a year you would save... For example, if you just buy 1 eyelash growth serum and 1 day cream all year long, you will save $119.01! That alone will make the annual membership worth it! WANT THOSE SAVINGS? Hit this button!  We will be launching with 11 products. Following our campaign, we will then release new products every month to few months, ensuring that members have a wide variety of product options to choose from. Aside from the savings we are passing onto you, we also wanted to ensure that each product we develop is top of the line and will be formulas that produce results. We will not compromise quality. Facial CleanserDay CreamNight CreamAnti-Aging CreamFacial TonerBody CreamBody ScrubWhitening ToothpastePlumping Lip GlossEyelash Growth SerumMascara In addition to high quality formulas and at-cost pricing, all our products will meet the following criteria: We want our brand and products to make a difference, but we also want them to be kind to the environment. We strive to use post-consumer resin and bioplastics in whatever packaging we can. This means they are much easier on the environment and 100% recyclable. We are always doing what we can to be more environmentally friendly.  By keeping things local and making our products here in the U.S, we're also keeping our carbon footprint down. LOVE OUR PRODUCT CRITERIA? Help make the world a better place by hitting this button! Why are we choosing a membership model instead of a traditional subscription model? Here's why: Because of the nature of the industry, the minimum order quantities for both packaging and products are high. We need the money to place the first orders for the packaging and the product bulk. Starting a business like this requires quite a bit of up-front cost. Which is why we are asking for your help! We need your help to jump-start DIME Beauty so we can make high-end beauty products affordable to all!  Baylee is a licensed master esthetician. She received her education and training from the National Institute of Medical Aesthetics. With her broad knowledge of the skin care and beauty industries, she continuously stays up-to-date on the best performing products on the market. However, Baylee soon recognized that quality products are very expensive. She thought there was a better way. She thinks you shouldn't have to break the bank to take care of your skin and look your best.   Luckily, her husband has a product development background in the skin care and beauty industries. A match made in heaven. So, she utilized her resources to develop a unique membership-based brand that offers high-end skin care and beauty products at-cost. Members, or DIMES, will have access to these prices for a low membership fee.  GET THESE REWARDS! Hit this button right now!    So, back us today and become part of a beauty brand that is disrupting the industry! Get the highest quality beauty products for at-cost pricing! We are excited to have you with us!Will the lifetime membership really last forever?   Yes! You’ll be able to access all our products at-cost for the rest of your life. This is how we’re kickstarting the brand. Everyone else will pay a monthly or annual membership like Costco.  If you’re selling at cost how do you make money?  We make money through the memberships sales: we cover our costs of product sales and make the profit on the small membership fee.What is the difference between getting a membership on Indiegogo or doing it through your website?  Everything else after this campaign will be monthly or yearly memberships.When will I be able to start using my membership?  You will receive an email to activate the membership at the beginning of Oct. 2018.Is DIME Beauty a subscription box? Will I get a box with your products every month?Nope! You can shop on our site dimebeautyco.com and choose the items you would like, whenever you want.  How does shipping work?  You will pay for shipping unless you spend over $35. If you do spend over $35, shipping will be FREE. For international orders, the shipping cost will depend on your location and the size of the package.  Exactly what ingredients are in each product?  Those are listed on our site at dimebeautyco.comWhere are the products made?  All of our products are made in Utah, USA.How much will your products cost members?Check our member pricing list above or you can visit dimebeautyco.com to check the price of each product.Do you test products on animals?  No, we never do. All of our products are 100% cruelty-free.WE ANSWERED ALL YOUR QUESTIONS! So, hit this button to back us today! RISKS AND CHALLENGESBecause we have formed a strategic partnership with a manufacturing plant we are confident we will be able to deliver our products on time as promised. We've already had a successful small batch production run without any glitches. During production we'll be on-site to ensure that our high-quality standards are met. If in the off chance there are setbacks, we will always keep you informed with frequent, transparent updates along the way.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Lindsay. I am a couple and family therapist opening a sex-positive therapy office in Portland, OR. What is sex-positive therapy? It is a type of therapy where people from all walks of life can come to talk about sexual and/or relationship issues and not feel judged.

I am passionate about therapy and love working with couples who have been experiencing problems in their relationships. I have specific training in working as a sex therapist and I make sure I am practicing research-informed therapy. I work with transgender couples, gay couples, kinky couples, polyamorous relationships, and everything else you can imagine!

All too often these groups feel marginalized by therapists or experience a therapist who has no knowledge of their lifestyle. I would like to help these groups have a place to talk and grow without fear of judgement.

The Need:

In order to start this project I need your help! Your donation will go toward 3 months of:

  • Rent
  • Printing materials
  • Marketing so I can let people know about my services
  • Professional memberships so I can stay educated about changes in the field
  • Supervision
  • Supplies for the office (tissues, paper, pens)
  • Attending networking events and conferences

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't give but still want to help? Sharing this project is the most helpful thing you can do.

story:
Short Summary

Jerome's Call is a non-profit organization seeking to help at-risk children and adults that may have experience childhood trauma.  We plan to use the ACE Overcomers program to reach out to children in Foster Care, Juvenile Halls, adults in prisons, and throughout churches in the community. We seek to help participants experience healing, learn about and take charge of their emotional wellbeing, and instill in them a sense of competency and purpose. Our eventual goal is to open up a therapeutic foster care facility in a ranch setting with vocational skills training, while continuing community outreach through the ACE Overcomers program.

 

The Impact

The negative impact of child abuse and neglect creates tremors throughout society that are nearly impossible to measure. Right now the estimated annual cost of child abuse and neglect is $220 million a day in America. Also, there is now strong evidence of a correlation between experiencing adverse childhood events and higher rates of health problems in their adult lives.  Very often the cycle of abuse continues at the hands of those who had been abused. For every person whom we're able to help heal, we stand to help generations of children to follow.

Estimated annual cost of child abuse and neglect

https://www.childwelfare.gov/topics/can/impact/...

ACE Study and quality of life correlation

http://www.cdc.gov/violenceprevention/acestudy/

Where does the funding go?

Funds we receive will be used to purchase workbooks for the individuals taking our class as well as further certification of our members to teach ACE Overcomers class, and promotion of our services

Where are we in our work?

We will begin teaching our first class on August 19th, and we have plans to be begin teaching our second class by October.

story:
(Mensaje continúa en español)

My life-long sister of my soul and roommate, Arlene Bonet, has just been unexpectedly diagnosed with Renal Cell Carcinoma. Both her kidneys. This type cancer, and particularly in her case, does not respond to Chemotherapy nor other forms of treatment, except surgery. She will need a partial nephrectomy on her right kidney on August 28th, 2014 and the total removal of her left kidney on October 7th, 2014. This took us all by surprise, considering she went to the hospital to be checked for something else. So we have chosen to see this diagnosis as a blessing in  disguise. ~~Mi hermana del alma y de toda la vida, Arlene Bonet, acaba de ser diagnosticada con Cáncer del Riñón. Ambos riñones. Este tipo de cáncer no responde a quimioterapia ni a otras formas de tratamiento, excepto cirugía. Ella requiere una extracción parcial de su riñón derecho, coordinada para el 28 de agosto de 2014 y la extracción total de su riñón izquierdo, pautada para el 7 de octubre de 2014. Ésto nos tomó por sorpresa, considerando que ella fue al hospital para ser revisada para algo totalmente distinto. Hemos elegido ver este diagnóstico como una bendición.

Arlene has worked as an independent contractor, including as a Massage Therapist, and this diagnosis and what is yet to come represents a dire financial burden on her. Hence, I have created this campaign, in the hopes that together we can contribute financially and help ease the added stress generated by the huge bills, care expenses, co-payments, etc. for these two surgeries, and all the other financially-draining tentacles that come along with them. ~~Arlene ha estado trabajando como contratista independiente, incluyendo su trabajo como Masajista y este diagnóstico y lo que está por venir, representa una gran carga económica para ella. Por ende, he creado esta campaña, con la esperanza de que juntos podamos contribuir económicamente y aliviar el estrés adicional que generan las grandes facturas, gastos de cuidado, co-pagos, etc. para estas dos cirugías y todos los otros tentáculos que drenan económicamente que vienen acompañando la situación.

Donations can be of any amount. No contribution is small! (We know these are hard times for everyone.) Indiegogo shows a default of $100.00 dollars, don't panic, it is an amount you can change and you can contribute what you can. For all, we are so very grateful! ~~Las donaciones pueden ser de cualquier cantidad. No hay tal cosa como una contribución pequeña. (Reconocemos que son tiempos difíciles para todos.) Indiegogo enseña una base de donación de $100.00. No te asustes! Puedes cambiar la cantidad a la contribución que anhelas hacer. Por todo, les estamos agradecidas grandemente.

We thank you in advance for your contribution and ask that you keep Arlene in your thoughts, prayers and/or conversations with a higher power/force. We also trust you will share this campaign with your friends and for that, we thank you!~~ Desde ya les damos las gracias por su contribución y les pedimos que mantengan a  Arlene en sus pensamientos, oraciones y/ó conversaciones con esa fuerza/poder superior. Tambien confiamos en que comparta esta campaña con sus amigos y por eso tambien les damos las gracias.

One other thing, if you saw the movie Beaches, then you get a picture of what she means to me! ~~ Otra cosita, si vió la película "Beaches", entonces tendrá una idea de lo que ella representa para mi!

Tai Pelli

story:
Help Asheville create their own Quidditch team!

Quidditch is a sport from the book series by JK Rowling, Harry Potter. And, thanks to some dedicated fans of the books, Muggle Quidditch has become an actual sport! (See iqaquidditch.com for more details.) Quidditch is important to us because it is a gender inclusive sport which makes it both unique and important in the world of organized athletics, and in addition, everyone is welcome to be a team member and/or supporter.

We will be a community team, so we will not be constricted by school schedules, other athletics, or graduation dates. This also means that all of the money raised through this campaign will be the main/only source of our team's funding.

Here's what we need the money for:

Quidditch supplies, including hoops, brooms, headbands (to distinguish the players), balls, team jerseys, and more. A full set of hoops alone cost around $300, and a full set of brooms is around $200. The jerseys alone cost around $1,000 dollars, but we want to focus on getting crucial supplies first.

To see images of some of the perks, visit our gallery!

story:
For the last 5 years I've raised money for the V Foundation for Cancer Research in celebration of my birthday.  Regardless of the amount $5 or $35 every dollar will help me reach my goal of $1,000.

If you can't contribute, but want to help me reach my goal, please share this page with others. All proceeds are tax deductible and the V Foundation spends 100% of donations on Cancer Research!  Help me party with a purpose!

-Marquez

story:
The fight for Athletic Freedom is coming soon. We're recruiting all athletes, new and elite, who want to train to become their best at sports and fitness. Together we'll work as a team to accomplish our training objectives and complete missions to prove our athletic training. So whether you're looking to lose a few extra pounds, sprint faster, or lift some heavy ass weight, we want YOU to join SportKore. Become a SportKore Soldier today and together we'll achieve Athletic Freedom!



For Beta Access Orders: After you've placed your order, please send us the email info for all Beta Access accounts at info@sportkore.com!


For T - Shirt Orders: After you've placed your contribution, please indicate your Shirt ID & Size, (i.e. A, Large) here or email us at info@sportkore.com!


I've been working on SportKore for the last year and we've come a long way. We need your support to help bring SportKore to millions of athletes looking to be a part of a worldwide training revolution. With your contribution, we'll be able to build and grow an Army of SportKore Soldiers who are looking to win the "Fight For Athletic Freedom."


So why should you support us? 


  • You'll become an "Original Warfighter" in the "Fight For Athletic Freedom!"


  • You'll build a better body and improve your performance with others looking to achieve their goals .


  • You'll receive the motivation, support, and guidance needed to take your training to the next level.


Isaac is an Army veteran who earned his B.S. in Business Administration from the University of Arizona (Dec. 12'). Having majored in Management Information Systems and Entrepreneurship, he's now looking to combine his love for sports, fitness, business, and technology to become the next successful tech entrepreneur.

Isaac is now on a lifelong mission to become a better athlete. While working to improve his athleticism, he hopes to inspire others to join him in the "Fight for Athletic Freedom." Sports and fitness are his passion, and plans to use his passion to help others reach their athletic goals.


1. Purchasing & Setup

2. Buying & Shipping

3. Technical

4. Privacy & Security

5. Additional Questions



1 - Alpha: When SportKore goes live, how do I get started?

We'll be sure to set you up and send you an email with your SportKore login information.


1 - Bravo: I've ordered multiple SportKore Beta Access accounts, how do I activate each user?

After you've placed your order, please send us your email information (for each beta account) at info@sportkore.com.


2 - Alpha: When will I receive my perks?

We will aim to ship out all perks by June 01, 2014.


2 - Bravo: What are the shipping costs?

If ordering from outside the continental U.S., please add $25 to your order for shipping.


3 - Alpha: What devices can I use to access SportKore!

SportKore is a web - application that can be accessed through a browser found on your desktop, laptop, tablet, smartphones, etc.


3 - Bravo: How do I earn experience points calculated!

You can earn experience points by accomplishing Missions, recording training activities, and earning achievements.


4 - Alpha: Is my information secure!

All of your data will be stored on our secure server. Your data is yours to own and you will be able to remove it from our servers at any point.


5 - Alpha: Can I cancel my pre - order!

We'd hate to see you go AWOL but all you would need to do is forward your pre - order confirmation email to info@sportkore.com with a simple request to cancel.


5 - Bravo: How can I reach out to SportKore!

Just shoot us an email at info@sportkore.com, and someone from our team will respond as soon as possible. 


5 - Charlie: How do I submit a feature, training activity, or mission request?

You can tell us all about it at request@sportkore.com!

story:
At 21 years of age, a girl has several dreams. But for Sapna life is not the same any more. A brazen acid attack has not only left her defaced but has also shattered her completely. Sapna suffered the attack at the hands of her cousin’s brother-in-law on August 7, 2013. The biker flung the acid bottle at the girl and sped past.

Reason: he wanted to marry Sapna. When she rejected his proposal, he thrashed her and even tried to strip her of her dignity. But still she did not give in to his pressure and continued ignoring him. Before throwing this dangerous yellow chemical on her face, the attacker had warned her that he would not let her marry anyone else and teach her a lesson.

The attack took place in police presence and near the GTB Hospital, but no one – the two cops, stationed at a check post, passersby and the hospital staff – cared to help the 21-year-old, writhing in pain.

Sapna was returning from her workplace with one of her friends when the gruesome attack left her charred. She was left crying in pain on the road for good 45 minutes, while her friend ran to her house to call her parents. It was only after her parents reached the spot that a PCR call was made. Sapna was taken to the GTB Hospital only to bear more distress. She and her parents kept pleading the authorities to admit her and start the treatment, but no staff attended to her for about half-an-hour.

The fight did not stop for our fighter here. She has to undergo some surgeries. Her relatives have severed all ties from her family. Both Sapna and her father have lost their jobs. The family is reeling under acute financial crisis. According to the Supreme Court’s directive, the government gives a compensation of Rs 3 lakh. But it’s about two months Sapna is yet to receive this amount.

The attacker has been arrested but just for three months. Sapna puts a brave front and continues fighting for justice. And as it goes …tareekh pe tareekh, tareekh pe tareekh… let’s see when the braveheart gets the justice finally.

At this hour, all of us should come forward and do whatever little we can to help her meet her medical expenses.
story_txt:
At 21 years of age, a girl has several dreams. But for Sapna life is not the same any more. A brazen acid attack has not only left her defaced but has also shattered her completely. Sapna suffered the attack at the hands of her cousin’s brother-in-law on August 7, 2013. The biker flung the acid bottle at the girl and sped past.
Reason: he wanted to marry Sapna. When she rejected his proposal, he thrashed her and even tried to strip her of her dignity. But still she did not give in to his pressure and continued ignoring him. Before throwing this dangerous yellow chemical on her face, the attacker had warned her that he would not let her marry anyone else and teach her a lesson.
The attack took place in police presence and near the GTB Hospital, but no one – the two cops, stationed at a check post, passersby and the hospital staff – cared to help the 21-year-old, writhing in pain.
Sapna was returning from her workplace with one of her friends when the gruesome attack left her charred. She was left crying in pain on the road for good 45 minutes, while her friend ran to her house to call her parents. It was only after her parents reached the spot that a PCR call was made. Sapna was taken to the GTB Hospital only to bear more distress. She and her parents kept pleading the authorities to admit her and start the treatment, but no staff attended to her for about half-an-hour.
The fight did not stop for our fighter here. She has to undergo some surgeries. Her relatives have severed all ties from her family. Both Sapna and her father have lost their jobs. The family is reeling under acute financial crisis. According to the Supreme Court’s directive, the government gives a compensation of Rs 3 lakh. But it’s about two months Sapna is yet to receive this amount.
The attacker has been arrested but just for three months. Sapna puts a brave front and continues fighting for justice. And as it goes …tareekh pe tareekh, tareekh pe tareekh… let’s see when the braveheart gets the justice finally.
At this hour, all of us should come forward and do whatever little we can to help her meet her medical expenses.

story:
A Bridge for Colonia Dora : Building a bridge to provide drinkable water to the school and inhabitants of Colonia Dora and give them the possibility to go to the hospital.

 

 

Who are we?

Engineering Without Borders Argentina (or Ingeniería Sin Fronteras Argentina) is a non-profit association conducting research, promoting and executing engineering surveys and projects which allow to improve people's life conditions throughout the Argentine nation.

We aim to build a fair, solidary and sustainable society through the elaboration of technological solutions in order to diminish poverty, preserve the environment and make society conscious of the necessity to advance towards a sustainable human development.

Our values are volunteer work, multidisciplinary approach, political and religious independence, sustainability and social equity.

 

What is the Colonia Dora problem?

Colonia Dora is in the North of Argentina, in the province of Santiago del Estero. In this town of 500 inhabitants there are bridges and routes which allow access to the rest of the region, but they are about to collapse or in very bad state because of summer floods, seasonal rains or the extreme droughts. This situation is extremely difficult for the Colonia Dora village: drinking water (brought by tank trucks), ambulances and school buses can't pass these bridges because of the high collapse risk.

There is an important need to provide water from outside: the local wells are contaminated by naturally produced arsenic, which makes the water in them highly toxic. The population depends on the bridges to receive the water, which comes from the water purifying plant of Añatuya 15 kms away, which comes in tank trucks which have to go a 30km additional distance to go to Colonia Dora without going on the damaged bridges. Every inhabitant of Colonia Dora gets 15 liters of water per day: considering the need to drink, cook, and wash themselves, this is clearly not enough.

Besides the water problem, the bridge is essential for road traffic (road machinery, rural machinery, ambulances...). Trade being the main activity of the area, the rural production is harmed by the extra distance that all trucks have to do to go to Colonia Dora: the extra cost is money that people need, and won't get for their family and children. The bad state of the current bridges also makes walking dangerous: several children have had dire accidents, falling into the channel.

 

What is the "A Bridge for Colonia Dora" project?

Engineers Without Borders Argentina is working with the different municipal and provincial departments (municipality, provincial road engineering direction, water ministry) in order to provide a durable solution to these difficulties. Among other actions, we will build two bridges linking Colonia Dora to the rest of the region. The construction will begin in October 2013 and will last for more than six months.

EWB Argentina will obtain the necessary materials through this crowdfunding campaign; on the other hand, the necessary labour and machinery will be provided by the municipality and the province.

Our aims are multiple:

  • Improving the quality and quantity of drinking water distributed to the population of the area, and educating people about the lack of drinkable water

  • Providing the school with the necessary water for its functioning

  • Motivate the population not to get beaten down by the harsh climate

  • Reducing the geographical isolation of Colonia Dora by improving its accessibility

  • Guaranteeing the safe circulation of road machinery, ambulances and other means of transports

  • Reducing the time and distance of the provision in order to promote local trade

  • More generally: improving the quality of life of 500 people. And you can do this, with just one little contribution !

 

What will be the end result of "A Bridge for Colonia Dora"?

The two bridges that will be constructed thanks to this fundraising will be made of concrete. The first bridge, built over RAM Channel, will be 12m long and 6.4m wide, and the second one, built over IV Channel, will be 9m long and the same width. Both will have a span of 3m.

 

The project consists of two phases :

  • Phase 1: Engineering and Fundraising
  1. Making of calculations, necessary drawings as well as calculation of materials and costs.
  2. Planification of the work.
  3. Obtention of the financing for the materials.
  4. Coordination with the Municipality and different organisms for the works.
  • Phase 2: Execution of the work
  1. Bypass of the channel.
  2. Earth movement.
  3. Making the concrete of the floor slab and aproximation structure.
  4. Making the concrete of pillars.
  5. Making the concrete slab and the bridge deck.
  6. Inauguration of the bridge and closing of the bypass.

Due to the local climate characteristics, these two stages may not be consecutive.

 

If you want more information : http://www.isf-argentina.org/puentes-colonia-dora/

Do not hesitate to join our partners through monthly donations instead of a one-time donation, via our website; all the money that we will earn during the crowdfunding campaign will be transferred to this project.

Please feel free to contact us for some more technical details; we would be glad to enlighten you!

story:
Short Summary

In 2012 I graduated from Touro College with a Master's Degree in Physician Assistant Studies. After working the past year for a surgeon in Hauppauge and Southampton, I have decided to take an 18 day medical trip to the Andean region of Peru to help indigenous Peruvians who suffer from poverty and lack of good medical care. 

Indigenous villages in this area suffer from the effects of ethnic/racial discrimination and poverty, battling a system with poor educational and vocational opportunities and sustaining poor access to health care.

I will be hiking up 14,000 feet with a backpack full of medical supplies and sleeping in tents. Over the next two months, I will begin the physical training required to make the hike up to these remote indigenous villages. 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to to take this trip, I will need to pay $3,000 to cover medical supplies, food, local guide and translator, and more. 

For those who make a donation, I will be bringing back crafts from the indigenous communities I visit. I will also be documenting my trip through social media after I return to internet access so that those who helped me accomplish my goal can see all the good they helped do. 

The Impact

Along the trek, I will be accomodating several clinics to diagnose and treat illnesses. I will work with doctors, dentists, optometrists, nurses and other medical professionals to help people who under normal circumstances have no access to healthcare.

story:
Help Fund a Speech and Dental Camp in Nepal

 

Situation:

 

Every 3 minutes a child is born with a cleft. For these children access to surgical care is necessary to fix the birth deformity. Thanks to the help of ReSurge International, many of them receive the surgical care they need, effectively improving appearance and reducing stigma, leading to a more promising tomorrow. However, such surgeries are often not performed in infancy. That means an older child will need to relearn how to speak as he or she adjusts to the new architecture of his or her mouth. 

 

Solution: 

 

To address the need, ReSurge International and it's partner in Nepal, Dr. Shankar Rai, have created week-long “Speech and Dental Camps” each month. These Speech and Dental Camps provide access to comprehensive cleft treatments to help our patients overcome related health conditions such as articulation disorder, hypernasal speech, speech and language delay, as well as a variety of dental problems. 

 

Your Contribution Will:

 

Provide 30-40 child and their families access to a week-long speech and dental camp where they will receive pre- and post-operative services in: 

  • speech therapies
  • pediatric dental services
  • nutrition education
  • orthodontic care. 

 

ReSurge’s Speech and Dental Camp Medical Teams consist of 1-2 plastic surgeons, 1 dental surgeon, 1 speech therapist, 4 speech therapy assistants, 1-2 orthodontists and dental assistants. 

 

Thousands of children have benefited from the program—and many have already “graduated” with successfully integrated speech patterns. With your investment today, you can help many more children benefit from these successful speech and dental camps.

Join ReSurge International and California State University Northridge's National Student Speech, Language and Hearing Association (CSUN-NSSLHA) to raise funds for one speech camp. 

About ReSurge International 

ReSurge International (formerly Interplast) provides free reconstructive surgeries for the poor and builds year-round medical access in underserved areas. It restores the dreams of those with deformities and injuries, and impacts the world by renewing the health of thousands of children and adults each year so they can go to school, provide for their families and contribute to society.

About CSU Northridge's National Student Speech, Language and Hearing Association (CSUN-NSSLHA)

CSUN-NSSLHA is a student organization on campus for students interested in the study of communication disorders and sciences (CDS). It is designed to:

  • Enhance students’ knowledge and skills pertaining to the field of speech-language pathology and audiology through creative events, guest lectures, open forums, and meetings.
  • Provide opportunities of networking through interaction, exchanging of ideas, and sharing of knowledge with other CDS students and professionals
  • Promote awareness of disorders, disabilities, and organizations through participation in fundraisers and events.
  • Provide relevant information for students' CDS academic career at California State University, Northridge
  • Inform members on local and national affairs concerning the field of work
  • Facilitate the transition from undergraduate to graduate to professional
